name: Dane's Hat
description: The sun-faded and lightly soiled hat of Dryleaf Dane. Worn low over the eyes, it obscures the wearer's vision. Meeting the gaze of another can overcome the senses, often leading to the downfall of those who would walk the noble and solitary seekers' path.
how_to_acquire: This Helm is obtained as a drop upon defeating Dryleaf Dane. [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Interactive Map]

name: Gaius's Helm
description: The black iron helm of Commander Gaius. Part of an armor set patterned after fallen seeds. Gaius was the most senior disciple of the same Alabaster Lord who taught Radahn and Gaea gravitational technique.
how_to_acquire: Purchased from the Enia at the Roundtable Hold, after defeating Commander Gaius.

name: Oathseeker Knight Helm
description: An Oathseeker Knight helm. Black with gold ornamentation. These knights set off on quests of discovery, hoping to find by themselves an oath of their own choosing to serve in perfect, lifelong devotion.
how_to_acquire: Found inside a hanging body, just outside the Church of Benediction. It contains the whole set: Oathseeker Knight Greaves, Oathseeker Knight Gauntlets, Oathseeker Knight Armor, and Oathseeker Knight Helm. It also contains Pata weapon. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Verdigris Helm
description: Helm made from an unusual metal known as verdigris. Verdigris is said to be the gift of an outer god. Possessed of an enormously hefty yet supple strength thanks to its rusted nature.
how_to_acquire: Complete Moore's questline

name: Pelt of Ralva
description: The pelt of Ralva the Great Red Bear, worn upon the head without modification. Enhances incantations of what is jokingly called "Bear Communion." This untreated hide, won at the end of a bloody bout, is just the thing to make a wild bear out of a warrior.
special_effect: Enhances incantations of "Bear Communion" by 15%.
how_to_acquire: This is a helmet type of armor that can be obtained after defeating Ralva the Great Red Bear. It is known to enhance incantations of what is jokingly called "Bear Communion." [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Fang Helm
description: Helm of Red Bear, whose name is lost to madness. The cheek guards are shaped after lion fangs. Perhaps his fascination with the untamed strength of the wild stemmed from his past as a Redmane.
how_to_acquire: Armor piece drops upon defeating the Red Bear located at the Northern Nameless Mausoleum. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Thiollier's Mask
description: A mask upon which is carved a tranquil sleeping face. The silver hair is arranged in the same style as St. Trina's, increasing arcane. Just once, Thiollier was granted the sweet repose of velvety sleep. The remainder of his days would be spent attempting to recapture it.
special_effect: Increases Arcane +3
how_to_acquire: Summon Thiollier during the battle at the end of his questline, then loot his body in the boss arena after the fight

name: High Priest Hat
description: The hat of Count Ymir, High Priest. The circular design at the top represents the Greater Will and its lightless abyss, imparting increased intelligence and arcane to the wearer. Though Count Ymir instructed Rellana in the sorcerous arts, he abandoned his allegiance to the moon. "It was merely the closest of the celestial bodies. Nothing more."
special_effect: Increases Intelligence +1 and Arcane +1
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Count Ymir, Mother of Fingers, who can be found in the Cathedral of Manus Metyr after interacting with the throne, you can only find Count Ymir there after you have defeated Metyr, Mother of Fingers. [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Caterpillar Mask
description: Grotesque mask constructed from countless solidified caterpillars. A ritual implement of the greater potentates of Bonny Village. Used to ward off thoughts of impurity, doubt, temptation, and other wickednesses one is vulnerable to while absorbed in divine ritual.
how_to_acquire: Complete Hornsent quest.

name: Dancer's Hood
description: Bright-red hood of the Ranah dancers. Enhances the power of dancing attacks. The dance of Ranah is one of burning passion, and the most passionate dancers never allow their fiery dance to end, losing even their names as they dance on. To see the passion fade is to see the dancer's flame extinguished.
special_effect: Enhances the power of dancing attacks by 2.5%.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by defeating Dancer of Ranah at the Southern Nameless Mausoleum [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Interactive Map]

name: Helm of Night
description: Bottomless black helm, cool to the touch.Flowing lines in the seeming shape of a fingerprint adorn the surface. Imprisons the wearer in utterly lightless dark.Bestowed upon those born deep underground, ordaining them as Swordhands of Night.
how_to_acquire: Bonny Gaol: Use the jar lift near the bridge twice to reach the top level of the gaol. First, hop on the jar, go to the bridge level, and activate the switch. Ride the jar lift for the second time to go to the top level. You can find the Night Set on a corpse laying on top of a table. [See SOTE Elden Ring DLC Map] [Video Link]

name: Igon's Helm
description: Helm of the broken drake warrior Igon, from a set of armor comprised of a miscellany of parts. This tattered protective-wear is shaped like a bugle. The poor scavenger of battlefields found honor through Dragon Communion.
how_to_acquire: Loot Igon after defeating Bayle the Dread.

name: Igon's Helm (Altered)
description: Helm of the broken drake warrior Igon, from a set of armor comprised of a miscellany of parts. Patched with scraps of cloth. The poor scavenger of battlefields found honor through Dragon Communion.
how_to_acquire: Alter Igon's Helm at any Site of Grace

name: Wise Man's Mask
description: The iron mask of Sir Ansbach, giving the appearance of a quiet, wise, old bearded man. But an old fear lurks beneath, together with the cold, unflinching discipline that once honed his blade, now employed to enhance Blood Oath and dynastic skills.
special_effect: Enhances Blood Oath and dynastic skills by 5%.
how_to_acquire: Complete Sir Ansbach's questline all the way through the end, and side with him when facing Leda, and then Promised Consort Radahn/ Radahn, Consort of Miquella. After the fight is over, Sir Ansbach's body will be near the site of grace, alongside with his equipment and his Incantation. [Map Link]

name: Freyja's Helm
description: Golden helm of Redmane Freyja, member of General Radahn's most distinguished knights. A hideous scarlet wound was once hewn into the center of her face. Later, Miquella gently put his lips to it and the unfading scar became the compass that Freyja would thereafter follow.
how_to_acquire: Drop by Redmane Freyja.

name: Helm of Solitude
description: Steel helm of the Knights of the Solitary Gaol. Part of a heavy armor set that covers the whole body in overlapping plates of steel. The nameless mausoleums of the realm of shadow are said to hold the spirits of warriors who lost their names, or their hearts.
how_to_acquire: Can be obtained after defeating the Blackgaol Knight found inside Northern Nameless Mausoleum. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Messmer Soldier Helm
description: Helm worn by soldiers who serve Messmer the Impaler. The iron helm features a visor. Though the engraving upon the forehead is a Scadutree design, it is etched in gold. A small consolation to those forced to wage a war without grace or honor.
how_to_acquire: Drop from Messmer Soldiers

name: Black Knight Helm
description: Helm worn by the Black Knights, servants of Messmer the Impaler. Black iron ornamented with gold. A rotten odor stubbornly clings to it. Perhaps it arises from the tainted nature of the blood that splattered upon it. Or perhaps it is the wearer's own blackened soul, festering after endless slaughter.
how_to_acquire: Black Knight Set pieces are dropped from Black Knights, found throughout the Lands of Shadow.

name: Rakshasa Helm
description: Helm of Rakshasa, soaked in the spurting blood of her victims. Tatters of ragged cloth jut out haphazardly, as if her lust for carnage threatens to break free.Increases damage dealt to foes, but greatly increases damage taken by the wearer.Cut down and devour. Only those who repeat the cycle without rest can truly subvert the self and become Rakshasa.
special_effect: Boosts All Damage by 2%
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Rakshasa in Eastern Nameless Mausoleum. This area can only be accessed by using the ladder in Shadow Keep to get down to a special teleport coffin (this Elden Ring Map location). This will take you to Ruins of Unte and you must follow the cliffs downstream and then carefully drop down to bottom level to reach the mausoleum. [Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Fire Knight Helm
description: Pointed helm of the Fire Knights under Messmer the Impaler's personal command. Slightly increases maximum HP, stamina, and maximum equip load. Each and every knight hailed from a renowned family of the Erdtree's upper echelons, but were shunned and chased from their homes after pledging allegiance to Messmer as their master.
special_effect: Slightly increases maximum HP by 2%, Stamina by 5%, and Equip Load by 4%.
how_to_acquire: Drop by Fire Knights in the Shadow Keep

name: Death Mask Helm
description: Helm of Wego, elder among the Fire Knights. Two warped death masks stacked one atop the other. Reduces FP used to summon spirits. Gnawed at by loneliness, the old man turned his attention to the spirituality of Messmer's flame, using it in a rite of resurrection. Yet the soulless bodies he brought to life were no comfort to poor Wego.
special_effect: Reduces FP to summon spirits by 12%
how_to_acquire: Drops from a Fire Knight miniboss in the cathedral area of Shadow Keep, after draining out the water.

name: Winged Serpent Helm
description: Helm of Kood, captain of the Fire Knights. A winged serpent perches atop it. Enhances Fire Knight skills. The winged serpent is the token creature of Messmer's military forces. It is a wise friend which keeps the base serpent at bay and holds its power in check.
special_effect: Enhances Fire Knight skills by 10%.
how_to_acquire: Shadow Keep: Sixth Floor: Climb the statues once you've used the lever to move them. Head outside, turn right and head up the stairs, turn left to find a Fire Knight at the end of the bridge. Drops this item and Ash of War: Flame Spear. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Salza's Hood
description: Hood of Salza, sage of the Fire Knights.A prodigious amount of cloth wound around it, giving the impression of a greatly swollen head, and wearing it increases intelligence.A disciple of the elder Wego, he refused to burn down an old ruin, at the risk of his own life.
special_effect: Increases Intelligence +2
how_to_acquire: From the West Rampart Site of Grace, take the bridge all the way. Use Torrent to avoid being trappped in the Rain of Fire. Defeat the Fire Knight at the end to obtain this and Rain of Fire. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Leather Headband
description: Headband worn by highland warriors, made of woven leather. The white favor represents their home settlement. Highland warriors are known to be hunters of bears; to them, there is no act more glorious than the subjugation of a savage beast.
how_to_acquire: To the northwest of the Ravine North Site of Grace, there is a forest inhabited by runebears. At the center of this forest, you'll find a large stone with several items on it, this whole armor set is at the top of the stone. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Leather Crown
description: Helm worn by highland warriors, pieced together using leather. The white favor represents their home settlement. Highland warriors are known to be hunters of bears; to them, there is no act more glorious than the subjugation of a savage beast.
how_to_acquire: Found laying on the grounds in the middle of the woods, alongside the rest of the Highland Warrior Set. [Map Link]

name: Death Knight Helm
description: Golden helm of the Death Knights, whose own death masks served as the visards of their armor. Enhances skills and incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult. The decayed golden wheel that adorns it represents their unbroken loyalty to Godwyn, he who became Prince of Death.
special_effect: Enhances skills and incantations of the ancient dragon cult by 2%.
how_to_acquire: Darklight Catacombs, on a Death Knight corpse

name: Curseblade Mask
description: A mask affixed with a crown of tangled horns, worn by those who would invoke divinity. Divine invocation heightens the dexterity of the wearer, but causes the blessing of the Erdtree to become nauseating, reducing the restorative effect of drinking from a flask of sacred tears. Focus is also troubled by wearing this mask.
special_effect: Increases Dexterity by +5, but reduces the flask value by -7%
how_to_acquire: Drop by Curseblade enemies.

name: Messmer's Helm
description: Black helm of Messmer the Impaler, crowned with two intertwined winged serpents.Slightly enhances incantations of Messmer's flame as well as Fire Knight skills.The winged snakes were Messmer's constant companions.They were there when the base serpent was sealed away behind his eye. They were there through his eternity of suffering. They will accompany him yet, in his hideous new form born when he destroyed the grace granted by his mother. They have accepted his fate as much as he.
special_effect: Slightly enhances incantations of Messmer's fire and Fire Knight skills by 3%.
how_to_acquire: Purchase from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Messmer the Impaler

name: Messmer's Helm (Altered)
description: Black helm of Messmer the Impaler, crowned with two intertwined winged serpents. Slightly enhances incantations of Messmer's fire as well as Fire Knight skills.The winged snakes were Messmer's constant companions.They were there when the base serpent was sealed away behind his eye. They were there through his eternity of suffering. They will accompany him yet, in his hideous new form born when he destroyed the grace granted by his mother. They have accepted his fate as much as he.
special_effect: Slightly enhances incantations of Messmer's fire and Fire Knight skills by 3%.
how_to_acquire: Alter Messmer's Helm at any site of grace.

name: Gravebird Helm
description: Stone helm with a tinge of green. One of a set of armor pieces cast in the image of the Gravebird. Empowers spells which summon rings of spectral light. Gravebirds are ancient golems, created to guard the spiritgraves built where all manners of Death ultimately drift.
special_effect: Empowers spells which summon rings of spectral light by 15%.
how_to_acquire: From the Spiral Rise site of grace, climb the spire until you get the elevator shortcut back down. Ride the lift down and jump off halfway into a central altar. [Map Link]

name: Common Soldier Helm
description: Helm of the rank-and-file soldiers of Messmer's army. A pitch-dark soot clings to it, much like the inner faces of the men who wore them.
how_to_acquire: Drop by soldiers in Castle Ensis

name: Horned Warrior Helm
description: Helm featuring a crown of sturdy tangled horns, allowing the wearer to invoke divinity. Attire of the horned warriors, keepers of the tower. Divine invocation bolsters the strength of the wearer, but causes the blessing of the Erdtree to become nauseating, reducing the restorative effect of drinking from a flask of sacred tears. Focus is also troubled by wearing this helm.
special_effect: Increases Strength by +5, but decreases healing from Flask of Crimson Tears by -7%.
how_to_acquire: Dropped from Horned Warriors

name: Divine Beast Helm
description: A helm of tangled horn attached to a divine beast mask, allowing the wearer to invoke divinity. Worn by divine beast warriors; the chosen of the horned warriors. Divine invocation heightens intensity of the storm alongside strength and dexterity, but reduces the restorative effect of drinking from a flask of sacred tears. Focus is also troubled by wearing this helm.
special_effect: Heightens intensity of the storm by 4%, boost Strength by +3 and Dexerity by +3, but reduces restorative effect of sacred tears by -9% and lower focus by -45
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Divine Beast Warriors, Enir Ilim

name: Divine Bird Helm
description: A helm of tangled horn attached to a divine bird mask, allowing the wearer to invoke divinity. Worn by divine bird warriors; the very first of all horned warriors. Divine invocation heightens the power of divine bird feathers alongside strength and dexterity, but reduces the restorative effect of drinking from a flask of sacred tears. Focus is also troubled by wearing this helm.
special_effect: Heightens the power of divine bird feathers by 10%, boost Strength by +3 and Dexerity by +4, but reduces restorative effect of sacred tears by -9% and lower focus by -45
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Divine Bird Warriors

name: Rellana's Helm
description: Ornate helm of Rellana, the Twin Moon Knight, fashioned from silver steel. Rennala, head of the royal family of Caria, was said to have given her younger sister, who renounced her lineage to chase after Messmer, a gift of lustrous black hair.
how_to_acquire: The complete set (Rellana's Set) can be bought from Enia in the Roundtable Hold upon defeating Rellana Twin Moon Knight.

name: Young Lion's Helm
description: The golden helm worn by Radahn in his younger years. Proudly displaying his heroic red hair, it is fitting attire for a lion. When Malenia, Blade of Miquella, let the rotflower blossom in Aeonia, Radahn heard a murmur in his ear "Miquella awaits thee, O promised consort."
how_to_acquire: Purchase from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Promised Consort Radahn / Radahn, Consort of Miquella in Enir-Ilim [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Circlet of Light
description: The circlet of light which adorned Miquella's head as he returned in divine aspect. It has begun to fade into nothingness. Slightly boosts intelligence, faith, and arcane, while also boosting the power of Miquella's light. This circle was to be the very foundation upon which Miquella's age of compassion would be built, should it have ever come to pass.
special_effect: +1 to Intelligence, Faith, and ArcaneBoosts the power of Miquella's Light
how_to_acquire: Obtained after defeating Promised Consort Radhan

name: Shadow Militiaman Helm
description: Helm as dark as shadow, worn by vulgar militiamen. Freshly-singed battlegrounds effusing with the stench of the dead. Forbidden lands that will be excised from the memory of history. What better place than the realms of shadow then, for such an army?
how_to_acquire: Dropped by the Shadow men

name: Divine Beast Head
description: Ritual headwear in the form of a divine beast's head, used to perform the lion dance. Worn by the very finest of the sculpted keepers. Alas, it no longer responds to the old woman's earnest prayer. Divine invocation heightens intensity of the storm alongside strength and dexterity, but reduces the restorative effect of drinking from a flask of sacred tears. Focus is also troubled by wearing this headwear.
special_effect: Heightens intensity of the storm by 10%, boost Strength by +4 and Dexerity by +4, but reduces restorative effect of sacred tears by -11% and lower focus by -63
how_to_acquire: The Divine Beast Dancing Lion drops this Helm upon defeat. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: St. Trina's Blossom
description: St. Trina's life withered and fell, as fleeting as the seasons. At her last, she left a single water lily. Slightly boosts max FP. Despite the velvety-purple hue, the flower is in no way poisonousit merely blooms in quietude.
special_effect: Boosts max FP by 6%.
how_to_acquire: Garden of Deep Purple: After completing Thiollier and St. Trina's questline, return to her cave in Garden of Deep Purple. You can pick up this item from her fallen body. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Elden Ring DLC Map]

name: Crucible Hammer-Helm
description: Helm worn by Devonia, longest-serving of the Crucible Knights. Holds the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations. It is said Devonia quested in search of the Crucible's origin, and departed from the lands of the Erdtree alone.
special_effect: Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible Incantations.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Devonia, Crucible Knight [Map Link]

name: Greatjar
description: A greatjar which fits comfortably over the head when upturned. Attire of the shamans who perform their worship at gaols. Increases the power of thrown pots of all sizes. They offer their prayers to the innards of the greatjars, such that they might be reborn one day into sainthood. This is the cycle of death and rebirth, taken into the hands of mortal men.
special_effect: Increases the power of all thrown pots by 16%.
how_to_acquire: Belurat Gaol: After leaving the jar labyrinth, you will pass a small bridge and fight 3 Mutated Prisoners, on quite a large platform. In order to advance the dungeon, you have to step on the jar at the end of the area, but don't do that. Instead, turn right to find another jar on a slightly lower level. Step on it, and it will take you high. Once there, jump from platform to platform, and once the area, opens up, the item is on a pedestal, beware of the enemies.

name: Imp Head (Lion)
description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem. Resembling a lion in appearance, life force faintly clings to it.
special_effect: +2 Vigor
how_to_acquire: Scorpion River Catacombs. Can be found on top of a platform if you ride one of the two spike trap platform lifts. [Video Link]

name: Alberich's Pointed Hat
description: Mad Tongue Alberich's pointed hat, a sign of a heretical practitioner. Set with red glintstones said to be formed by the blood of sacrifices. Strengthens thorn sorcery. Alberiches was an aloof yet disturbed heretical sorcerer said to have been driven mad by jeering tongues during his service to the Roundtable Hold long ago.
special_effect: Strengthens thorn sorcery by 6%.
how_to_acquire: The entire Alberich's Set can be found in the main hall of the Fortified manor in Leyndell, Royal Capital, near the Fortified Manor, first floor Site of Grace. Elden Ring Map here

name: Alberich's Pointed Hat (Altered)
description: Mad Tongue Alberich's robe.Alberich was an aloof yet disturbed heretical sorcerer said to have been driven mad by jeering tongues during his service to the Roundtable Hold long ago.
how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Alberich's Pointed Hat if you have it in your possession.

name: Albinauric Mask
description: Made from the largely unaltered hide of a young Albinauric.Raises arcane, but reduces the HP recovery effects of the Flask of Crimson Tears.A far cry from godskin, this Albinauric hide mask is the product of malicious mockery.
special_effect: +4 Arcane,reduces the HP recovered from Flask of Crimson Tears by 10%.
how_to_acquire: Found in Volcano Manor near the Guest Hall grace. Ascend the stairs to the top floor of the building. Head outside and take the ladder to your left onto the roof. Go to the back of the roof and jump off the right side to a balcony, then enter a room with an Omenkiller, the Albinauric Staff, and the Albinauric Mask. Elden Ring Map here

name: All-Knowing Helm
description: Helm set with countless eyes and ears. Worn by Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing. Knowledge begins with the recognition of one's ignorance. The realization that the search for knowledge is unending. But when Gideon glimpsed into the will of Queen Marika, he shuddered in fear. At the end that should not be.
how_to_acquire: The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing upon defeat. He is fought in Leyndell, Capital of Ash, an alternate version of the Royal Capital accessible only after making significant progress in the story. Elden Ring Map here

name: Aristocrat Hat
description: Leather hat decorated with a withered feather.Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital, and the belonging of a family which claims a knight as an ancestor.Abandoning their birthplace after the Shattering, these undead wanderers are the pitiful product of unending life.
how_to_acquire: Drops from Soldier Aristocrats that can be found wandering the roads of most areas.

name: Aristocrat Headband
description: Valuable headband featuring fine goldwork.Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital.Abandoning their birthplace after the Shattering, these undead wanderers are pitiful product of unending life.
how_to_acquire: Rare chance to drop from Aristocrat Sorcerers seen in larger groups of Aristocrat enemies that wander the roads of most areas.Easily farmed in Kingsrealm Ruins, south of the Road to the Manor site of grace.

name: Ash-of-War Scarab
description: Gray scarab worn directly on the head.These scarabs roll clumps of Ashes of War during their labors.Slightly reduces the FP cost of skills, but increases damage taken.
special_effect: Reduces the FP cost of skills by ~14%. Increases damage taken by ~5%.
how_to_acquire: Behind the waygate on the Limgrave Tower Bridge that takes you to the Divine Tower of Limgrave on a broken section of the bridge. Elden Ring Map here

name: Astrologer Hood
description: Hood fashioned from supple cloth. Worn by those who look to the cosmos above. They read fate in the stars, and are said to be heirs of the glintstone sorcerers. But alas, the night sky no longer cradles fate.
how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Astrologer ClassCan be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for 1,000 Runes. Elden Ring Map here.

name: Azur's Glintstone Crown
description: Crown of Azur, primeval current sorcerer, set with a prominent blue-green glintstone.This crown replaced Azur's brain and skull altogether, and now, removed from his body, it is all but dead. What power remains within raises the potency of Azur's primeval current sorceries at the cost of additional FP consumption.
special_effect: Increases the damage of Comet Azur by 15%, and Glintstone Cometshard and Comet by 10%. Increases FP consumption from sorceries by 15%.
how_to_acquire: The complete Azur's Glintstone Set is found at Azur's location after completing Sorceress Sellen's questline where you side with her. Elden Ring Map here

name: Bandit Mask
description: Mask of black cloth that covers the mouth. Favored by bandits for hiding their faces, it also provides some protection against poison.
how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in North Limgrave for 1500 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

name: Banished Knight Helm
description: Thick, full set of armor covering the entire body. This helm was worn by knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes. Perhaps the deep-red scarf was used to block the winds, for on the outskirts, the winds bite with a stinging fierceness.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Banished Knights in Stormveil Castle.

name: Banished Knight Helm (Altered)
description: Thick, full set of armor covering the entire body.This helm was worn by knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes.These fierce warriors were each and all accomplished. Perhaps that is why, despite their territorial losses, they were still named knights.
how_to_acquire: Stormveil Castle. Looted from the Banished Knight located next to the Chapel in the northwest section, where Sorcerer Rogier is located.

name: Beast Champion Helm
description: Silver helm engraved with tiny beasts. Worn by Bernahl the Recusant.The beasts, their eyes and ears covered, represent an oath: "See nothing, hear nothing, doubt nothing, and carry on, along the path set in stone."
how_to_acquire: The entire Beast Champion Set drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. Either defeat him at Warmaster's Shack or defeat the Recusant Bernahl invasion in Crumbling Farum Azula. Location in Elden Ring Map here.

name: Black Dumpling
description: "Mask forced on a victim's head to lend torture an extra degree of cruelty.It magnifies one's fears and makes them acutely aware of all forms of pain.Raises attack power when the wearer suffers from madness.When the Black Dumpling goes on, the torturer no longer seeks answers; only to inflict suffering without hope of relief."
special_effect: Raises attack (+10 % to all damage) when the wearer suffers from madness for 60 seconds
how_to_acquire: Dropped by the enemies found at Volcano Manor who wear it.

name: Black Hood
description: Hood of lusterless black fabric that conceals its wearer's identity.In this world, there is very little that must necessarily be known.
how_to_acquire: In the Sage's Cave, in a treasure chest behind an illusory wall. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Black Knife Hood
description: Hood used by the Black Knife Assassins. The assassins that carried out the deeds of the Night of the Black Knives were all women, and rumored to be Numen who had close ties with Marika herself.
how_to_acquire: The entire Black Knife Set is found on a corpse under an archway behind Ordina, Liturgical Town in Consecrated Grounds. Map Link.

name: Black Wolf Mask
description: A mask fashioned after the head of a black wolf.Relic of an assassin who assumed the guise of Ranni the Witch's loyal shadow. The likeness is striking.
how_to_acquire: Found behind Seluvis's Rise, reached by running and jumping up the crumbling part of the wall near the entrance to the tower. Elden Ring Map here

name: Blackflame Monk Hood
description: Mail hood of iron links covering a headband engraved with black flames.Attire of the Blackflame Monks.The Blackflame Monks, enthralled by the god-slaying black flame, became traitors, abandoning their posts as guardians. The seduction of a taboo is never easily spurned.
how_to_acquire: Drops from Blackflame Monks

name: Blackguard's Iron Mask
description: Iron mask forced on convicted prisoners.Worn by the blackguard Big Boggart.To Boggart, the mask made him all the more threatening, and helped him get what he wanted. But it was also a mirror of his emptiness.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by the merchant Blackguard Big Boggart upon defeat. Elden Ring Map here

name: Bloodhound Knight Helm
description: Metal helm with a pointed beak. Worn by the Bloodhound Knights. The Bloodhound Knights are trained as hunters and known to be unshakable trackers. Without the use of language, each knight chooses his own master. Once the decision has been made, the knight stays loyal for life.
how_to_acquire: The entire Bloodhound Knight Set is dropped by the Bloodhound Knight guarding the Gelmir Knight Set pickup in the Gelmir Hero's Grave. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Bloodsoaked Mask
description: Mask formed from tightly-wound bandages soaked through with blood. Even the most ghastly cover is more inviting than the festering face beneath.
how_to_acquire: Looted from a corpse in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds near the Underground Roadside site of grace. Elden Ring Map here.

name: Blue Cloth Cowl
description: Cowl of a nomadic warrior. The blue color of its fabric symbolizes brisk waters, as fluid and flowing as the sword in the hand of its wearer. Just as still waters turn foul, stagnation leads to decay. Warriors must remain ever-drifting.
how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Warrior Class.Purchasable from Isolated Merchant (Raya Lucaria) Elden Ring Map here

name: Blue Festive Hood
description: Hood worn by dancers at the festivities in Dominula, the village of windmills.Use of this hood, dyed in a stunning blue, is only permitted for the young maids who play the central role in the festival.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by the blue clothed dancers in Dominula, Windmill Village.

name: Blue Silver Mail Hood
description: Chainmail hood crafted with blue silver.Worn by the wolf-riding Albinauric archers.Blue silver is a metal born from the same mother as the archers themselves, and provides protection from magic and frost.
how_to_acquire: Albinauric Wolfback Archers found in the Consecrated Snowfield, as well as the Ordina Gaol, drop the Blue Silver Set pieces.One that is easily farmed can be found shortly north of the Consecrated Snowfield site of grace.

name: Brave's Cord Circlet
description: Warrior's headband of woven leather.Garb worn by warriors of the frigid uplands.The small flags, white cloths and sheaves of wheatoften found hung from these headbands areprayers of farewell from the people of their home.In bidding farewell to warriors departing ona journey from which they aren't like to return,this small act offers only meager relief.
how_to_acquire: Currently unavailable

name: Brave's Leather Helm
description: Battlewear wrapped in thick leather.Garb worn by warriors of the frigid uplands.
how_to_acquire: Currently unobtainable.

name: Briar Helm
description: Battered iron helm from a foreign land.Worn by Elemer of the Briar.The winding, rusted iron briars are the mark of the guilty, and typically indicate a sentence of death. They also cause this armor to deal damage when performing dodge rolls.Elemer murdered numerous instructors and merchants, and was known as the Bell Bearing Hunter.
special_effect: Deals damage when rolling into targets. Damage increases exponentially with more briar pieces.
how_to_acquire: Purchased from the Enia in Roundtable Hold after defeating Elemer of the Briar in The Shaded Castle

name: Bull-Goat Helm
description: Great Horned Tragoth's helm, adorned with a gold bull-goat motif. Provides high poise.Tragoth is a famed knight of assistance. Countless Tarnished, facing adversity in the Lands Between, have survived thanks only to the Great Horned One's aid
how_to_acquire: Can be found after killing Patches' assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Great Horned Tragoth. Elden Ring Map here

name: Carian Knight Helm
description: Helm of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family.The enchanted knights, anointed by the Lunar Queen, were heroes of the highest honors, but fell into disarray with the decline of the royal family.
how_to_acquire: From the Church of the Cuckoo site of grace, travel to the rotating lift section. On the right side of the gate's entrance, look down as you are hugging the wall to find a platform that you can drop to. Walk on the narrow path and you'll notice a group of Glintstone Zombies worshipping a statue. The entire Carian Knight Set is found at the foot of that statue..

name: Cerulean Tear Scarab
description: Blue scarab worn directly on the head. These scarabs roll clumps of cerulean tears during their labors.Slightly increases the recovery effects of the Flask of Cerulean Tears, but increases damage taken.
special_effect: Increases the recovery effects of the Flask of Cerulean Tears by 10%, but increases damage taken.
how_to_acquire: Sellia, Town of Sorcery in Caelid. Found on a corpse on top of a roof in the northeast section of town. Requires platforming across the rooftops. Elden Ring Map here

name: Chain Coif
description: Coif made of woven chain. Standard issue for ordinary soldiers. Though plain in appearance, it offers dependable protection.
how_to_acquire: Can be found at Church of Elleh, purchased from Merchant Kale. It costs 1000 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

name: Champion Headband
description: Headband reserved for the badlands' bravest. Proof that the wearer has slaughtered countless foes. Following the example of their chieftain Hoarah Loux, the brave warriors of the badlands shun excess adornment.
how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Hero Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in south Caelid for 1,000 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

name: Cleanrot Helm
description: Winged helm of the Cleanrot Knights, celebrated for their undefeated campaign in the Shattering.The Cleanrot Knights vowed to fight alongside Malenia, despite the inevitable, if gradual, putrefaction of their flesh. Their acceptance of their fate made these battles fiercest of all.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Cleanrot Knights in the Swamp of Aeonia, The Shaded Castle, or Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

name: Cleanrot Helm (Altered)
description: Winged helm of the Cleanrot Knights, celebrated for their undefeated campaign in the Shattering.The Cleanrot Knights vowed to fight alongside Malenia, despite the inevitable, if gradual, putrefaction of their flesh. Their acceptance of their fate made these battles the fiercest of all.
how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Cleanrot Helm into Cleanrot Helm (Altered).

name: Commoner's Headband
description: A headband that holds cloth in place.Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between. Only, there are no commoners remaining with their wits about them.
how_to_acquire: The Commoner's Headband is found on a corpse in Mt. Gelmir. After the Temple of Eiglay site of grace, take the elevator up and jump off the outside balcony into the area below. Follow the path past the Abductor Virgin into the window of the manor. Continue until you are on a walkway overlooking the lake the lava lake with Serpent statues on the right side. The Commoner's Headpiece is on a corpse on the head of the second statue. Elden Ring Map here

name: Commoner's Headband (Altered)
description: A headband with the cloth removed.Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between.Only, there are no commoners remaining with their wits about them.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Commoner enemies found in Stormveil Castle, Leyndell, Royal Capital, and other areas of the map.The non-altered Commoner's Headband is looted from a specific corpse and neither piece can be altered by the player.

name: Confessor Hood
description: Black hood for blending in with the darkness. Worn by church confessors. The churches outside the Lands Between, dedicated to the teachings of the Two Fingers, send confessors out to follow the guidance of grace. The confessors are loyal servants to the Two Fingers, ready to hunt down and quietly dispose of their enemies.
how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Confessor Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for 1000 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

name: Confessor Hood (Altered)
description: Cloth headwrap worn under a church confessor's black hood.Such hoods are made for blending in with the darkness.
how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Confessor Hood into Confessor Hood (Altered).

name: Consort's Mask
description: Mask worn by Tanith, Lady of the Volcano Manor, in the image of a foreign queen.Increase dexterity.Long ago, when Rykard first set eyes on Tanith, she was working as a dancer in a foreign land. Soon, he made her his consort.She was the only human to remain by his side when he became the serpent of blasphemy.In that moment, Tanith was truly charmed by him.
special_effect: +1 Dexterity
how_to_acquire: Looted from the corpse of Tanith after attacking her and defeating the summoned Tannith's Knight near the Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy site of grace in Volcano Manor, Altus Plateau. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Crimson Hood
description: A hooded cloak of vivid crimson. Worn by expatriated royalty. Increases vigor. Such cloaks were gifted to those who departed on journeys without specific orders, to faraway lands from which they would never return. In other words, the gift of a cloak made it easier for undesirable to be on their way. Roderika never once saw the guidance of grace.
special_effect: +1 Vigor
how_to_acquire: Stormveil Castle: It is found where the Chrysalids' Memento was initially found after unlocking Spirit Tuning. Elden Ring Map here

name: Crimson Tear Scarab
description: Red scarab worn directly on the head.The red scarabs roll clumps of crimson tears during their labors.Slightly increases the recovery effects of the Flask of Crimson Tears, but increases damage taken.
special_effect: Increases the recovery effects of the Flask of Crimson Tears by 10%, but increases damage taken.
how_to_acquire: On a rooftop at Volcano Manor, Altus Plateau. Elden Ring Map here

name: Crucible Axe Helm
description: Helm of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. The axe ornamentation is the knight Ordovis's mark, displayed also by his men. Holds the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations.
special_effect: Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations by 4%.
how_to_acquire: The whole Crucible Axe Set is dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis Boss. Elden Ring Map Link.

name: Crucible Tree Helm
description: Helm of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. The great tree ornamentation is the knight Siluria's mark, displayed also by her men. Holds the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations.
special_effect: Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations by 4%.
how_to_acquire: The whole set is found in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind a Boss: Crucible Knight Siluria. Elden Ring Map here

name: Cuckoo Knight Helm
description: Helm worn by Raya Lucaria Academy knights.Its brow is adorned with a single cuckoo's feather.
how_to_acquire: Dropped from Raya Lucaria Academy Knights, also referred to as Cuckoo Knights. There are three near the East Raya Lucaria Gate site of grace.

name: Depraved Perfumer Headscarf
description: Headscarf worn by depraved perfumers.These heresy-inclined perfumers imbibe their own spices to alter body and mind. Their slow descent into self-destruction is what earned them their name.
how_to_acquire: The Depraved Perfumer Set pieces can be farmed from the Depraved Perfumer enemies located around The Shaded Castle.

name: Diallos's Mask
description: Replica of a twin-tailed silver helm with flowery adornments. Only, without the twin tails. Diallos Hoslow had an older brother who was a stern, self-possessed man of a few words. His achievements made him seem out of reach. And so the younger aspired to be like the older. Yearning for the day that he would tell the tale of House Hoslow, in blood. Knowing full well that it would break his brother's heart.
how_to_acquire: Found upon completion of Diallos's questline.Can also be gained by killing Diallos in North Liurnia of the Lakes. Elden Ring Map here

name: Drake Knight Helm
description: Black iron helm worn by drake knights.Features the spoils of a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partaker of communion.From birth, drake knights speak not a word. They spend their lives pursuing the strength of dragons, for its sublime beauty and inspiration of awe.
how_to_acquire: The entire Drake Knight Set is found in Crumbling Farum Azula. From the Dragon Temple Roof site of Grace, kill both Stormhawks you see first, then descend the ladder. Look left from the bottom of the ladder and drop down onto a balcony. Follow the path and circle around the tower to find the set in a chest. [Elden Ring Map here]

name: Drake Knight Helm (Altered)
description: Black iron helm worn by drake knights.Features the spoils of a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partaker of communion.From birth, drake knights speak not a word. They spend their lives pursuing the strength of dragons, for its sublime beauty and inspiration of awe.
how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Drake Knight Helm if you have it in your possession.

name: Duelist Helm
description: Bronze helm decorated with innumerable snakes.Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes.The snake is viewed as a traitor to the Erdtree, and the audience delighted in seeing these bronze effigies beaten and battered.
special_effect: Increases likelihood of being targeted by foes.
how_to_acquire: The Duelist Set pieces can be dropped as loot from the Duelist enemies located in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: Eccentric's Hood
description: A pointy, ragged hood.Worn by the knight Jerren.The hood hides an aged, bearded mask.Jerren served General Radahn as a guest commander, and they are said to have sworn an oath of honorable death to one another.
how_to_acquire: The entire Eccentric Set is obtained from choosing to kill Witch-Hunter Jerren at the end of Sorceress Sellen's questline. Elden Ring Map here

name: Eccentric's Hood (Altered)
description: A pointy, ragged hood.Worn by the knight Jerren.The hood hides an aged, bearded mask.Jerren served General Radahn as a guest commander, and they are said to have sworn an oath of honorable death to one another.
how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Eccentric's Hood into Eccentric's Hood (Altered).

name: Elden Lord Crown
description: Crown of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. The age of the Erdtree began amongst conflict, when Godfrey was lord of the battlefield. He led the War against the Giants. Faced the Storm Lord, alone. And then, there came a moment. When his last worthy enemy fell. And it was then, as the story is told, that the hue of Lord Godfrey's eyes faded.
how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Godfrey, First Elden Lord and Hoarah Loux, Warrior.

name: Envoy Crown
description: The soft bundle worn on the head by Oracle Envoys.Densely wrapped in several layers of cloth.Raises the potency of bubble-based skills.No one knows what the cloth hides, but some claim to have heard a faint whimpering from inside. It must have been their imagination.
special_effect: Increases Potency of bubble skills (unique skills on Envoy weapons) by 15%.
how_to_acquire: Miquella's Haligtree. Southeast of the Haligtree Canopy site of grace, on a corpse at the southern tip of the thicker right branch. Elden Ring Map here

name: Exile Hood
description: Deep red hood that covers the whole head.Worn by soldiers sent to the penal colonies, who were required to keep their faces hidden.
how_to_acquire: Drop from Castle Guard.

name: Festive Hood
description: Hood worn by dancers at the festivities in Dominula, the village of windmills.Decorated with many-colored flowers.
how_to_acquire: Dropped from the yellow clothed dancers in Dominula, Windmill Village

name: Festive Hood (Altered)
description: Hood worn by dancers at the festivities in Dominula, the village of windmills.Decorated with a stunning array of flowers.
how_to_acquire: Obtained by altering Festive Hood at a site of grace or via Boc the Seamster.

name: Fia's Hood
description: Hood of black cloth that covers the whole head.Worn by Fia, the Deathbed Companion, on her journey after being exiled from her home.The fabric iteself is soft as silk.
how_to_acquire: Found on Fia after progressing her questline and defeating Lichdragon Fortissax.

name: Finger Maiden Fillet
description: Fillet worn by maidens who serve the Two Fingers. The maidens live to serve a chosen Tarnished, sharing their guidance and the wisdom of the Two Fingers. The guidance of grace would ensure that the pair be brought together. Or at least, such was the promise long ago.
how_to_acquire: Can be found inside Church of Inhibition directly beside a Grace. Run past NPC invader to touch Grace first. Elden Ring Map here

name: Fingerprint Helm
description: Iron helm singed and blistered by fingers.Worn by Vyke, knight of the Roundtable Hold.No other Tarnished was closer to the throne of the Elden Lord than Vyke. But without announcement, Vyke traveled far below the capital, and was scorched by the flame of frenzy.Did he make his choice for his maiden, or did some other force lure him with suggestion?
how_to_acquire: Lord Contender's Evergaol: Dropped by Roundtable Knight Vyke upon defeat. Elden Ring Map here

name: Fire Monk Hood
description: Mail hood of iron links covering a headband engraved with flames. Attire of the Fire Monks.The Fire Monks are guardians of the flame of ruin, forbidden by the Erdtree and said to be kept high in the Mountaintops of the Giants.
how_to_acquire: Pieces of the Fire Monk Set are dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintop of the Giants.

name: Fire Prelate Helm
description: Helm engraved with a sacred countenance and housing a cauldron.Attire of the Fire Prelates, commanders of the Fire Monks.It is said the cauldron perched atop the head was originally furnished with embers, and would surge into flames when the wearer's faith reached its zenith. The fire of this cauldron has since died out, however.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Fire Prelates, found in Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir or in the Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintop of the Giants.

name: Foot Soldier Cap
description: Flanged iron cap widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by enemy Foot Soldiers across the game.

name: Foot Soldier Helm
description: Wholly unembellished iron helm.Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.
how_to_acquire: It can be farmed at Caelid. Starting from the grace Chamber Outside the Plaza in Redmane Castle, go south and there will be four foot soldiers wearing the helm.

name: Foot Soldier Helmet
description: Helmet with a protective metal plate.Widely issued to foot soldiers in lord's army.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Foot Soldiers in Liurnia of the Lakes.

name: Gelmir Knight Helm
description: Helm worn by knights once loyal to Praetor Rykard. Its crest of red feathers symbolizes Rykard's pedigree as Lord Radagon's son.
how_to_acquire: You can loot the entire Gelmir Knight Set in the Gelmir Hero's Grave dungeon from a Gelmir Knight corpse. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Gilded Foot Soldier Cap
description: Flanged cap made from gilded iron.Issued to foot soldiers protecting the royal capital of Leyndell.
how_to_acquire: Chance to drop from Soldier enemies found in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: Glintstone Scarab
description: Blue-green scarab worn directly on the head.These scarabs roll clumps of sorcery during their labors.Slightly reduces FP costs of sorceries, but increases damage taken.
special_effect: Reduces the FP cost of Sorceries by ~15%. Increases damage taken.
how_to_acquire: Found inside a chest in Raya Lucaria Academy, past the Iron Ball Trap. Elden Ring Map here

name: Godrick Knight Helm
description: Helm worn by knights loyal to Godrick the Grafted.Adorned with a plum of withered, ashen hair.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by the heavy Godrick Knights scattered across Limgrave.

name: Godrick Soldier Helm
description: Helm worn by soldiers loyal to Godrick the Grafted. Made from durable iron, layered with a chainmail coif beneath.
how_to_acquire: Gatefront Ruins: Dropped by the Godrick Soldiers patrolling the outpost

name: Godskin Apostle Hood
description: Hood made by seweing together patches of smooth skin.Worn by the Godskin Apostles.The apostles, once said to serve Destined Death, are wielders of the god-slaying black flame. But after their defeat by Maliketh, the Black Blade, the source of their power was sealed away.
how_to_acquire: Defeating Godskin Apostle, located at the bottom of Divine Tower of Caelid. Elden Ring Map here

name: Godskin Noble Hood
description: Hood made by sewing together patches of smooth skin.Subcutaneous fat makes it plump and soft.Worn by Godskin Nobles.Nobles are the most ancient apostles who are said to have assimilated inhuman physiology. Not unlike the crucible, the Erdtree in its primordial form.
how_to_acquire: Defeat the Godskin Noble found on the bridge that connects the study hall to the Divine Tower of Liurnia. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Grass Hair Ornament
description: A headdress made from wildflowers.Wearing this might make you less easy to spot.
how_to_acquire: The Grass Hair Ornament Helm is currently unavailable in-game.

name: Great Horned Headband
description: Headband decorated by a pair of great horns.Worn by ancestral follower warriors.
how_to_acquire: Drops from Ancestral Follower in Siofra River

name: Greathelm
description: Sturdy greathelm made from iron. Though it is uncomfortably heavy and obstructs the vision of the wearer, it provides considerable damage negation.
how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in south Caelid for 1,800 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

name: Greathood
description: Hood far larger than the head it is meant to cover. A burial shroud of sorts for those who discover, at long last, the truth they sought.Increases intelligence and faith to the detriment of HP."Yes, surely this is the moon that young Rennala gazed upon."
special_effect: +2 Intelligence, +2 Faith, Reduces HP by 9%.
how_to_acquire: Given as a reward for solving the puzzle of the Sorcerer Painting. Travel slightly south of Castle Sol to the Snow Valley Ruins Overlook. From there, head for the nearby bridge, where a ghost of a painter can be found. Speak to the painter to receive the Greathood. Elden Ring Map here

name: Guardian Mask
description: Engraved golden mask.Worn by the guardians of the Minor Erdtrees.In accordance with an ancient pact with the Erdtree, it is said that their deaths lead not to destruction, but instead to renewed. eternal life as guardians.
how_to_acquire: Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.

name: Guilty Hood
description: Coarse hooded cloak of olive brown. The garb of those accused of lesser crimes, indicated by the collar of sharpened branches.
how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for 500 Runes. Elden Ring Map hereCan be found on a corpse in the sewers north of Avenue Balcony site in Leyndell Royal Capital. Elden Ring Map here

name: Haima Glintstone Crown
description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.Increases intelligence and strength to the detriment of FP.Scholars of the Haima Conspectus sought the power to quell conflict, and to this end studied the sorceries of cannon fire and the gavel.
special_effect: +2 Strength,+2 Intelligence. Reduces max FP by 10%.
how_to_acquire: This piece is dropped by Battlemage enemies.The entire Battlemage Set drops from a particular Battlemage enemy, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge. Elden Ring Map Link

name: Haligtree Helm
description: Helm worn by soldiers sworn to the Haligtree. An iron helm graced by a crown of unalloyed gold. Increases faith.
special_effect: +1 Faith
how_to_acquire: Haligtree Soldiers drop all pieces of the set. They are located throughout all areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

name: Haligtree Knight Helm
description: Helm worn by knights sworn to the Haligtree.Graced by a crown of unalloyed gold.Increases faith.
special_effect: +2 Faith
how_to_acquire: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: Looted from a corpse located near the Elphael Inner Wall site of grace. It is in the room at the top of the ladder directly adjacent to the grace site. Elden Ring Map here

name: Hierodas Glintstone Crown
description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy. Increases intelligence and endurance to the detriment of FP. The crown of Hierodas was granted to scholars who engaged in nomadic study away from the academy.
special_effect: +2 Intelligence, +2 Endurance. Reduces max FP by 10%
how_to_acquire: Hermit Village in Mt. Gelmir: Found on a corpse behind a house on the south side of the village. Elden Ring Map here

name: High Page Hood
description: Hood of a page selected for special privilege by the noble they serve.The unassuming sack-like appearance benefits their unseen and unknown stature.
how_to_acquire: The High Page Hood and High Page Clothes can be farmed from High Pages.The earliest one that can be found is in Raya Lucaria Academy. From the Church of the Cuckoo site, enter the church and take the shortcut ladder up. On the other side of the room is a long hallway with a High Page at the end.They can also be found in Leyndell, Royal Capital in various buildings.

name: Highwayman Hood
description: Hideously stained and ragged hood. Worn by former foot soldiers who have turned to banditry.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by a Bandit at Murkwater Cave

name: Hoslow's Helm
description: A twin-tailed silver helm decorated with flowery adornments. Symbol of the head of the revered House of Hoslow.Juno Hoslow had a younger brother who was all talk and no trousers. His inability to commit to action was such that Juno inherited the Hoslow legacy without resistance, granting him the freedom to shower his little brother with adoration.
how_to_acquire: All pieces of Hoslow's Set are dropped by Juno Hoslow along with Hoslow's Petal Whip as part of the final contract for the Volcano Manor questline. His invade rune be found in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants, east of Shack of the Lofty. Elden Ring Map here

name: Iji's Mirrorhelm
description: Helm fashioned from a crystal looking-glass, said to have never left War Counselor Iji's head.Easily broken and weak against striking attacks.Worn by those committed to high treason, it wards off the intervention of the Greater Will and its vassal Fingers.Iji was afraid. Terrified of his own treachery.
how_to_acquire: After the player confronts Blaidd during Ranni's questline, War Counselor Iji will have new dialogue available. Upon exhausting that and returning to the area again, his corpse can be found near his usual spot at the Road to the Manor grace site. Upon his anvil the player will find Iji's Mirrorhelm as well as Iji's Bell Bearing. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Imp Head (Cat)
description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem. Resembling a cat, it holds trace amounts of feline intelligence.
special_effect: +2 Intelligence
how_to_acquire: Rare drop from Imps. Elden Ring Map here

name: Imp Head (Corpse)
description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem.Resembling the visage of a corpse, it holds trace amounts of lingering faith.
special_effect: +2 Faith
how_to_acquire: Looted from a corpse in an alley off the avenue in Leyndell, Royal Capital. Elden Ring Map here

name: Imp Head (Elder)
description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem. Resembling an elder, it holds trace amounts of arcane knowledge.
special_effect: +2 Arcane
how_to_acquire: Can be found as a treasure inside Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs, in a room in the second floor, guarded by a Burial Tree Watchdog. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Imp Head (Fanged)
description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem.Resembling a fanged demon, it holds trace amounts of bestial strength.
special_effect: +2 Strength
how_to_acquire: Rare drop from Imps

name: Imp Head (Long-Tongued)
description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem. Resembling a long-tongued demon, it holds trace amounts of vexatious dexterity.
special_effect: +2 Dexterity
how_to_acquire: Can be looted off of Imps in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds

name: Imp Head (Wolf)
description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem.Resembling a wolf, it holds trace amounts of lupine endurance.
special_effect: +2 Endurance
how_to_acquire: Can be found in the Minor Erdtree Catacombs within Caelid on a body laying over a sarcophagus. Elden Ring Map here

name: Incantation Scarab
description: Golden scarab worn directly on the head.These scarabs roll clumps of incantations during their labors.Slightly reduces the FP costs of incantations, but increases damage taken.As a scarab approaches death, it abandons its rolled treasure and stretches its wings wide for long journey to its home nest.
special_effect: Reduces the FP cost of incantations by 15%. Increases damage taken by 5%
how_to_acquire: Need to examine the Homing Instinct Painting at Artist's Shack first. The Incantation Scarab can be found Southwest of the Dragon-Burnt Ruins, there will be a gravestone with a ghost sitting in front of it. Interact with the ghost, and it will drop the Incantation Scarab. Elden Ring Map here

name: Iron Helmet
description: An iron helmet showing rust on its edges. Cloth covering the mouth and neck provides some resistance to poison and other irritants.
how_to_acquire: Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for 1500 Runes. Elden Ring Map here.

name: Iron Kasa
description: Iron kasa of the man who calls himself Shabriri.Crafted to imitate the woven straw hats worn in the Land of Reeds.The man, once known as Yura, kept a woman in the deepest reaches of his heart.
how_to_acquire: Acquired by following Yura's questline. Elden Ring Map here

name: Jar
description: Jar that fits cleanly over the head when upturned.Made with pride by Iron Fist Alexander.In a uniquely jarlike gesture of friendship, it boosts the power of throwing pot items.
special_effect: Boosts the power of Cracked Pot and Ritual Pot consumables by 15%
how_to_acquire: Given to the player by Iron Fist Alexander. Follow his questline until you find him in Mt. Gelmir near Seethewater Terminus. Completing his dialogue here will award the player with the Jar. Elden Ring Map here

name: Juvenile Scholar Cap
description: Cap worn by young academy scholars, the juveniles birthed anew by the amber egg of Queen Rennala, the head of Raya Lucaria Academy. Yet their rebirth is not without imperfections, and thus do they repeat the process, eventually becoming utterly dependent upon it. Rebirth is as sleep to them, and with each awakening, memory fades into oblivion.
how_to_acquire: The entire Juvenile Scholar Set and a Larval Tear is obtained by completing the Resurrection Painting puzzle. Elden Ring Map here

name: Kaiden Helm
description: Helm worn by Kaiden sellswords. These hulking, fearless mercenaries, said to hail from the mountaintops of the wintry north, are adept at fighting on horseback. Kaiden is the name of their home settlement.
how_to_acquire: Drops from Kaiden Sellsword enemies. They can be found east of Limgrave's lake.

name: Karolos Glintstone Crown
description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy. Increases intelligence to the detriment of stamina. The Karolos Conspectus is the oldest of the academy's lineages of study, begat by the sorcerer Azur. Scholars who follow in his footsteps pursue the mysteries of comets.
special_effect: +3 Intelligence. Reduces max Stamina by 9%
how_to_acquire: From the Debate Parlor Site of Grace in Raya Lucaria Academy, head out the door and hug the western wall, ignoring the broken staircase or any open doorways. A crystal crab is hiding in the corner near the cliff edge. Elden Ring Map here

name: Knight Helm
description: Iron helm of an unknown knight. It is made of thin iron plate. Such metal armor is heavy, but provides considerable damage negation.
how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for 3,000 Runes.

name: Land of Reeds Helm
description: Helm made from strips of iron fastened together. Worn by warriors of the Land of Reeds. The Land of Reeds has long been locked in a miserable civil war, during which time it has remained alienated from the cultures of its neighbors. Little wonder that the entire nation has succumbed to blood-soaked madness, or so it is said.
how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class.Sold by Isolated Merchant Dragonbarrow for 1,000 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

name: Lazuli Glintstone Crown
description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.Increases intelligence and dexterity to the detriment of HP.Scholars of the Lazuli Conspectus study Carian sorceries - a heterodox pursuit that views the moon as equal to the stars.
special_effect: +3 Intelligence, +3 Dexterity. Reduces HP by 18%
how_to_acquire: See the location on the Elden Ring Map here.Found at Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Leyndell Knight Helm
description: Helm worn by knights sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.The golden canopy represents the honor of standing among the tree's defenders.
how_to_acquire: Chance to drop from Leyndell Knights encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: Leyndell Soldier Helm
description: Helm worn by soldiers sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.Made from durable iron, layered with a chainmail coif beneath.
how_to_acquire: This helm and other pieces of the Leyndell Soldier Set can be looted as drops from the foot soldiers scattered around Altus Plateau, and Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: Lionel's Helm
description: Round iron helm with a distinctive large brim. Worn by Lionel the Lionhearted. When this chivalrous dauntless knight met Fia, who had been driven from her home, he declared himself to be her father.
how_to_acquire: Lionel's Armor Set is found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Lusat's Glintstone Crown
description: The giant blue glintstone crown worn by Lusat, primeval current sorcerer.This crown replaced Lusat's brain and skull altogether, and now, removed from his body, it is all but dead. What power remains within raises the potency of Lusat's primeval current sorceries at the cost of additional FP consumption.
special_effect: Increases the damage of Stars of Ruin by 15%, and Star Shower and Glintstone Stars by 10%. Increases FP consumption from sorceries by 15%.
how_to_acquire: Lusat's Glintstone Crown can be found after completing Sorceress Sellen's Questline, return to Lusat's location in the Sellia Hideaway. The legwraps will be there, along with the rest of his set for the taking. Elden Ring Map here

name: Malenia's Winged Helm
description: Winged helm made of unalloyed gold.Worn by Malenia, Blade of Miquella.Malenia awaited Miquella at the foot of the husk.My brother will keep his promise. He possesses the wisdom, the allure, of a god he is the most fearsome Empyrean of all.
how_to_acquire: Purchased from Enia for 12,000 runes after defeating Malenia Blade of Miquella

name: Malformed Dragon Helm
description: A malformed golden helm. Adorned with various dragon imagery and worn by the misshapen Tree Sentinels. After the great ancient dragon Gransax attacked, the sentinels had an epiphany. The only way to truly protect the Erdtree was to become dragons themselves
how_to_acquire: Dropped by the Draconic Tree Sentinel in Crumbling Farum Azula. Elden Ring Map here

name: Maliketh's Helm
description: Beast's helm made of black iron and decorated with gold. Worn by Maliketh the Black Blade.Maliketh, Queen Marika's loyal half-brother, bore a blade imbued with Destined Death, and there was not one demigod who did not fear him. Champions knew what was at stake. Indeed, that is what made them champions
how_to_acquire: Bought from the Enia in the Roundtable Hold after defeating Maliketh, the Black Blade.

name: Marais Mask
description: Mask in the image of a white-haired young noble. Customarily worn by the head of House Marais. Increases arcane. The Marais family has a dual history spanning generations, serving as both executioners and castellans of the Shaded Castle. This mask bears the likeness of the first of their line.
special_effect: +1 Arcane
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan, a hostile NPC found in the fields west of The Shaded Castle. Elden Ring Map here

name: Marionette Soldier Birdhelm
description: Metal helm formed in the likeness of the face of a bird.Worn by avionette soldiers, crafted to serve the sorcerers.The construction of this helm is remarkably crude.For a doll, the only thing that matters is that it does not break.
how_to_acquire: Dropped from winged Marionette Soldiers.

name: Marionette Soldier Helm
description: Cylindrical helm of plate metal reinforced with a lattice. Worn by marionette soldiers, crafted to serve the sorcerers.The construction of this helm is remarkably crude.For a doll, the only thing that matters is that it does not break.
how_to_acquire: Drops from Marionette Soldiers often found at Liurnia of the Lakes or Mt. Gelmir.

name: Mask of Confidence
description: Mask with the mouth sewn shut with gold thread. Increases arcane. When Radagon married Rennala, he ordered the Carian magic preceptors to don these masks. To make it clear that all of their matters were to be kept strictly private.
special_effect: +3 Arcane
how_to_acquire: Found on a corpse laying on the walls of the secret area of the Carian Study Hall unlocked using the Carian Inverted Statue. Elden Ring Map here

name: Mushroom Crown
description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body. These overgrown mushrooms form a towering headpiece. Raises attack power when something nearby suffers from poison or rot. Long ago, great lords served the scarlet rot. Perhaps such fungal bodies served as their crowns.
special_effect: Raises attack power (+10% AR for 20 seconds) when something nearby suffers from poison or rot.
how_to_acquire: Found on a corpse hanging off of a pillar ruin in the south-eastern corner of Lake of Rot. Climb around the outside of the ruin to reach it. Elden Ring Map here

name: Mushroom Head
description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body. These overgrown mushroom have colonized the head. To those enraptured by the scarlet rot, they are holy vestments that root one to the earth.
how_to_acquire: Found in a cavern in Seethewater Cave filled with mushroom people and a Giant Poison Flower. Elden Ring Map here

name: Navy Hood
description: A hooded cloak of deep navy. Worn by expatriated royalty. Increases mind. Such cloaks were gifted to those who departed on missions to faraway lands, from which they would never return. But what choice did they have, having seen the guidance of grace?
special_effect: +1 Mind
how_to_acquire: The Navy Hood along with other pieces of the Noble's Set can be found at East Windmill Pasture, Altus Plateau, in a burning pile of corpses surrounded by a circle of dancing women. Elden Ring Map here.

name: Night Maiden Twin Crown
description: Twin crowns worn by the nightmaidens of the Eternal City.Indicates the highest clerical rank, and hides the eyes with silk.Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.
how_to_acquire: Pieces of the Night Maiden Set are dropped by Night Maiden enemies found in Nokron and Nokstella.Two can be found in the Night's Sacred Ground area in the church with the large Silver Tear Ball. Once this building's shortcut is opened these two can be easily farmed by resetting at the Night's Sacred Ground site of grace.

name: Night's Cavalry Helm
description: Pitch-black helm with flowing black hair.Worn by the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds.The Night's Cavalry, who now wander the dim roads at night, were once led by the Fell Omen and were deliverers of death for great warriors, knights, and champions.
how_to_acquire: You can find the Night's Cavalry Set within the Consecrated Snowfield: From the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace at night, look southwest and there will be a caravan being pulled by two giants and two Night's Cavalry escorts. Kill both the escorts to receive the armor alongside an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone. See the location in the Elden Ring Map

name: Night's Cavalry Helm (Altered)
description: Pitch-black helm thinly painted with dried blood.Worn by the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds.The Night's Cavalry, who now wander the dim roads of night, were once led by the Fell Omen and were deliverers of death for great warriors, knights, and champions.
how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Night's Cavalry Helm, if you have it in your possession.

name: Nomadic Merchant's Chapeau
description: Chapeau of the nomadic merchants.Decorated with tiny gems in a wide spectrum of colors.These merchants once thrived as the Great Caravan, but after being accused of heretical beliefs, their entire clan was rounded up and buried alive far underground.Then, they chanted a curse of despair, and summoned the flame of frenzy.
how_to_acquire: After defeating Mohg, the Omen, open the secret passage behind the altar and journey into the mass grave. The full Nomadic Merchant's Set is found behind the first breakable tent you can see. Break the tent by baiting out a Frenzy attack from the Nomad there. [Elden Ring Map here]

name: Nox Mirrorhelm
description: Helm fashioned from a crystal looking-glass. One among the Eternal City's ritual implements. Easily broken and weak against striking attacks. Worn by those committed to high treason, it wards off the intervention of the Greater Will and its vassal Fingers.
how_to_acquire: Cliffbottom Catacombs: In the sealed room, accessible by using a Stonesword Key at the Imp Statue. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Nox Monk Hood
description: Silk hood worn by the monks of the Eternal City.Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.
how_to_acquire: Can be looted from the Nox Priest common enemies in Nokstella, Eternal City.

name: Nox Monk Hood (Altered)
description: Hood worn by the monks of the Eternal City.Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.
how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Nox Monk Hood into Nox Monk Hood (Altered).

name: Nox Swordstress Crown
description: Crown worn by the swordstresses of the Eternal City.These women are the personal guards of the nightmaidens, and the silk hides their eyes.Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.
how_to_acquire: Pieces of the Nox Swordstress Set are dropped by Nox Swordstress enemies found in Nokron and Nokstella.Three can be found in relatively close proximity to the Nokstella, Eternal City site of grace. One up the stairs in a side room, and 2 in the river riding giant ants.

name: Nox Swordstress Crown (Altered)
description: Crown worn by swordstresses of the Eternal City.The silk eye covering is removed, flaunting convention.Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.
how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Nox Swordstress Crown into Nox Swordstress Crown (Altered).

name: Octopus Head
description: A land octopus whelp worn directly on the head. Has a lingering warmth reminiscent of human skin. Those who can withstand the smell will find its organic elasticity excellent for negating strikes.
how_to_acquire: Found by killing Land Octopus or Giant Land OctopusThere are dozens of them south-west of Temple Quarter site of grace

name: Okina Mask
description: A wooden mask that depicts an old man baring his teeth. The source of the sobriquet of the great swordman of the Land ofReeds.Raises dexterity as it lowers focus.The more he sharpened his mind, the more the absurdities of theworld came into stark relief. And so Okina renounced it all, androse to a higher plane. There was only himself. His katana. And itsmastery.Before long, Okina became a demon of a swordsman.
special_effect: +3 Dexterity. Reduces focus by 44 points.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Bloody Finger Okina at Mountaintops of the Giants. Elden Ring Map here

name: Old Aristocrat Cowl
description: Cowl made of soft cloth.Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital. Garb favored by the aged.Abandoning their birthplace after the Shattering, these undead wanderers are the pitiful product of unending life.
how_to_acquire: All pieces of the Old Aristocrat Set are dropped by the Old Aristocrat enemies, often found within larger groups of Aristocrats wandering the roads of most areas. The green cowl makes them easily distinguishable from other Aristocrats.There are a number of Old Aristocrats within the caravan of enemies north of the Agheel Lake South site of grace.Altus Plateau- There are Old Aristocrats to the left of Gold Mask's Bridge.

name: Olivinus Glintstone Crown
description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy. Increases intelligence to the detriment of HP. The lineage of the Olivinus Conspectus began with the sorcerer Lusat, and its adherents continue his study of meteors.
special_effect: +3 Intelligence. Reduces HP by 9%.
how_to_acquire: From the Schoolhouse Classroom site of grace, turn left and head to the room at the end of the corridor. Attack the empty bookshelf to reveal a hidden passage. Head out, turn left, and then jump up the rocks to find this item on a corpse. Elden Ring Map here

name: Omen Helm
description: Malformed helm resembling an Omen with its horns cut off.Worn by the Dung Eater, their form is a vision of the landscape of his mind, and of his appearance as he wished to see it.The heart of an omen without the body to match; could there be any crueler existence? What does it matter, then, if the curse claims at all?
special_effect: Increases damage of Omen Bairn and Regal Omen Bairn by 5%.
how_to_acquire: The Omen set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds at the Leyndell Royal Capital. Elden Ring Map here

name: Omensmirk Mask
description: Mask with long, hideously twisted horns worn by the Omenkillers.Increases strength. Bears the smirking face of an elder, twisted in wicked delight. This visage is carved in the image of the evil spirits that haunt the Omen in their nightmares.
special_effect: +2 Strength
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Omensmirk and wearing mask outside of Lower Capital Church Site of Grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital. Elden Ring Map here

name: Page Hood
description: Hood worn by pages who serve the nobility and are mindful to keep them out of harm's way. The unassuming sack-like appearance befits their unseen and unknown stature.
how_to_acquire: Drops from Page enemies.

name: Perfumer Hood
description: Hood of an Erdtree Capital perfumer.In time past, the role of perfumer was much respected; a blessed apothecary in the eyes of the many. But after entering the battlefields of the Shattering they performed no such role, trading their aromatics for poisons and explosives.
how_to_acquire: Chance to drop from Perfumer enemies encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: Preceptor's Big Hat
description: Large hat with the movements of the stars drawn on the inside of the brim.
