Worn by the magic preceptors who served the Carian royals.Increases mind to the detriment of stamina.Glintstone sorcerers are the descendants of astrologers, a fact that the Carians remain of aware of. Even if their fate has been long severed from the stars.
special_effect: +3 Mind. Reduces max Stamina by 9%.
how_to_acquire: Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline. Elden Ring Map here

name: Prisoner Iron Mask
description: Iron mask forced on a prisoner convicted of an appalling crime. Thick, heavy, and utterly stifling. A foul creation designed to torment the wearer, either slowly fermenting hatred within their heart, or a spiritual fervor that is near indistinguishable from it.
how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Prisoner Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Ainsel River for 1000 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

name: Prophet Blindfold
description: Blindfold of exiled prophets who foretold misfortune and were persecuted and driven from their homes as a result. Why hesitate, if the path leading to the future is clear? Just close your eyes, and walk.
how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Prophet Class.Can be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for 1,000 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

name: Pumpkin Helm
description: An oval helmet large enough to cover any head. Very heavy and very hard.Reduces damage from headshots and impacts.The inside of the helm is pitch black, keeping the crazed warrior within from panicking. Perhaps its rather roomy interior also helps alleviate feelings of pressure and claustrophobia.
special_effect: Reduces damage from headshots and impacts.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Pumpkin Head. Can be found in Castle Morne's courtyard, [Elden Ring Map here] or at Waypoint Ruins. [Elden Ring Map here]

name: Queen's Crescent Crown
description: A tall crown depicting the moon. Worn by Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon. Increases intelligence. When Rennala, head of both the Academy of Raya Lucaria and the Carian royal family, lost her husband Radagon, her heart went along with him. And then, those at the academy realized. That Rennala was no champion, after all.
special_effect: +3 Intelligence
how_to_acquire: The Queen's Crescent Crown Helm can be purchased to Enia in Roundtable Hold for 7,000 Need to defeat Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon Bossfight first.

name: Radahn Soldier Helm
description: Helm worn by soldiers who fought by General Radahn's side. Its visor is fashioned after a lion's fangs.
how_to_acquire: Easily found in large numbers around Fort Gael. Elden Ring Map Here

name: Radahn's Redmane Helm
description: Helm of the golden lion, with flowing red hair.Worn by General Radahn.Radahn inherited the furious, flaming red hair of his father Radagon, and is fond of its heroic implications."I was born a champion's cub. Now I am the Lord of the Battlefield's lion."
how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for 8,000 runes once Starscourge Radahn has been defeated.

name: Radiant Gold Mask
description: A mask designed to resemble a blazing golden halo.Created and left behind by Lord Goldmask, a staunch pursuer of Golden Order fundamentalism.Strenthens Golden Order incantations.Its striking design represents both the brilliant inspiration that once shone upon him, and the vision of a ring that he will surely find at the end of his pursuit."To you who seek to shine as I do, wear it well!"
special_effect: Strengthens Golden Order incantations.
how_to_acquire: Found on collapsed bridge NW of Writheblood Ruins. Drop down two times heading south and it is on a body. Elden Ring Map here

name: Ragged Hat
description: Helm pieced together from scavenged metal.
how_to_acquire: Not currently obtainable.

name: Ragged Hat (Altered)
description: Helm pieced together from scavenged metal.
how_to_acquire: Not currently obtainable.

name: Raging Wolf Helm
description: A helm worn by Vargram the Raging Wolf, one of the first Tarnished to visit the Roundtable Hold. Vargram earned his nickname from the white wolf pelt that adorns this helm.
how_to_acquire: Leyndell, Royal Capital. After obtaining the second to last letter from Volcano Manor, you will be sent to assist Knight Bernahl with assassinating Vargram the Raging Wolf and Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm. On successful invasion, you will receive the full Raging Wolf Set. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Raya Lucarian Helm
description: Helm worn by Raya Lucaria Academy soldiers.Its brow adorned with a single cuckoo's feather.
how_to_acquire: The Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Carian Manor drop all pieces of the Raya Lucarian Soldier Set. They are easily farmed on the ramparts after the Manor Lower Level site of grace.

name: Redmane Knight Helm
description: Helm worn by knights who fought by General Radahn's side.The red plume is a symbol of Radahn's pedigree as Lord Radagon's son - the mane of the proud Red Lion.
how_to_acquire: Chance to drop from Radahn Knight in Fort Gael. Elden Ring Map here

name: Rotten Duelist Helm
description: Bronze helm decorated with innumerable snakes, eaten through by scarlet rot. Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes.
special_effect: Increases likelihood of being targeted by foes.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by a Rotten Duelist in the Consecrated Snowfield. Elden Ring Map here

name: Royal Knight Helm
description: Silver helm of Loretta, a Knight who served Miquella's Haligtree.Loretta, once a royal Carian Knight, went on a journey in search of a haven for Albinaurics, and determined that the Haligtree was their best chance for eventual salvation.
how_to_acquire: Can be brought from Finger Reader Enia, at Roundtable Hold after defeating Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree for 4000.

name: Royal Remains Helm
description: Helm graced with gold human bones.Worn by the unspeaking adherent of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing.Slowly replenishes HP when HP is reduced.It is said that the bones belong to an ancient lord - the soulless king. The lord of the lost and desperate, who was known as Ensha.
special_effect: Slowly replenishes HP when HP is under 18%.
how_to_acquire: Upon attaining the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right), Ensha of the Royal Remains will invade the players world the next time they travel back to Roundtable Hold. The full Royal Remains Set is acquired after beating him.

name: Ruler's Mask
description: Mask in the image of a wizened sage. Customary dress among lords in a smaller nation. Increases faith. Such a mask illustrates the qualities of an ideal lord: chiefly, wise and possessing a certain defanged geniality. One at the center of society often finds these qualities most expedient.
special_effect: +1 Faith
how_to_acquire: The Ruler's Mask Helm can be found on a corpse laying face-down on a carriage northeast of the Abandoned Coffin site of grace in west Altus Plateau, alongside the Ruler's Robe. Elden Ring Map here

name: Sacred Crown Helm
description: Flanged iron cap adorned with a crown of unalloyed gold.Increases faith.Worn by foot soldiers sworn to the Haligtree.Who is it that Miquella shall bless, if not the low and the meek?
special_effect: +1 Faith
how_to_acquire: Drops from the ballista soldiers just outside of the Elpheal Inner Wall site of Grace. Elden Ring Map here

name: Sage Hood
description: A burgundy pointed hood. Attire of the wise sages who were deemed heretical. Evidence that the wearer was driven from town.
how_to_acquire: Can be found in Stillwater Cave - Liurnia of the Lakes, just ahead and below the Lake Facing Cliffs, it's all sitting on a poison submerged corpse near the end, guarded by Giant Bats that will attack you when you take it. Elden Ring Map here

name: Sanguine Noble Hood
description: Hood of dyed black cloth featuring gold embroidery. Worn by the nobles who serve the Lord of Blood. Known to strike from pools of blood, these assassins are missionaries come to share the gospel of accursed blood.
how_to_acquire: The entire Sanguine Noble Set is dropped by Sanguine Noble NPC invasion in west Mountaintops of The Giants. Includes Sanguine Noble Hood, Sanguine Noble Robe and Sanguine Noble Waistcloth. Elden Ring Map here

name: Scaled Helm
description: Helm worn by Old Knight Istvan.The corroded metal is reinforced with rock-hard scales, making it highly effective against non-physical attacks.Istvan is one of a few wizened Tarnished who survive to this day.
how_to_acquire: Can be found after killing the first assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Old Knight Istvan. Elden Ring Map here

name: Shining Horned Headband
description: Headband decorated by a pair of shining horns. Worn by ancestral follower shamans.Horns with buds that also shine are ideal ceremonial items for ancestral worship. Strengthens Ancestral Infant's Head.
special_effect: Increases the attack power of Ancestral Infant's Head by 20%.
how_to_acquire: Chance to drop from Ancestral Follower Shaman, which can be found singing in the Ancestral Woods in Siofra River.The Ancestral Woods area is only available after gaining access to Nokron, Eternal City.

name: Silver Tear Mask
description: Mask fashioned from the corpse of a formless Silver Tear, supported by its hardened, shed husk. Greatly increases arcane to the detriment of physical attack power. To imitate the imitator is a cunning play indeed.
special_effect: +8 Arcane. Reduces physical attack (-5% AR)
how_to_acquire: Dropped by the Mimic Tear boss in Nokron, Eternal City. Elden Ring Map here

name: Skeletal Mask
description: Skeletal mask that tightly grips the face.Worn by the assassin's of Ravensmount.This ritual implement relentlessly digs into the wearer's face, preserving one's human instincts while dressed in imitation of the Deathbirds.
how_to_acquire: he Sage's Cave, in a chest behind an illusory wall. Elden Ring Map here

name: Snow Witch Hat
description: Witch's pointed hat, frigid and frozen through. Of a style associated with practitioners of heretical sorcery. Strengthens cold sorcery. Once worn by the snowy crone who the young Ranni encountered deep in the woods. She was a witch, and well versed in cold sorceries. It is said that the doll that houses Ranni's soul was modeled after her. That old witch was Ranni's secret mentor.
special_effect: Strengthens cold sorceries by 10%.
how_to_acquire: Found in a chest on the upper floor of Renna's Rise during the progression of Ranni's questline. Elden Ring Map here

name: Spellblade's Pointed Hat
description: Glintstone sorcerer Rogier's traveling attire, graced with an intricate, aristocratic decoration. Strengthens glintstone sorcery skills. Rogier spent his entire life behaving with utter detachment. No one noticed the anger, grief, regret, or fear that existed along with it.
special_effect: Strengthens magic and cold weapon skills by 2%.
how_to_acquire: Roundtable Hold - Drops from Rogier.

name: Traveler's Hat
description: Hat of a traveling perfumer of no renown. An associate of a healer, he is said to be in search of new aromatics and flower gardens, in hopes of treating Misbegotten, Omen and all those seen as impure.
how_to_acquire: Found in a corpse in one of the corners of the buildings within Street of Sages Ruins, in Caelid's Swamp area, alongside the entire Traveler's Set. Elden Ring Map here

name: Traveling Maiden Hood
description: Hood worn by traveling maidens.Maidens traversed the Lands Between for different reasons. Some to seek audience with the Fingers. Others, to find the Tarnished who they were destined to guide.
how_to_acquire: On a corpse inside the Shack of The Lofty in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants. The rest of the set can also be looted here. Elden Ring Map here

name: Tree Sentinel Helm
description: Golden helm of the heavy cavalry Tree Sentinels who serve the Erdtree.Very few are permitted to wear a golden wood crest of such size as seen on this helm.
how_to_acquire: The entire Tree Sentinel Set is obtained by destroying all three chariots in the Auriza Hero's Grave. Elden Ring Map here

name: Twinned Helm
description: Helm depicting entwined twins of gold and silver.The two known as D are inseparable twins.They are of two bodies and two minds, but one single soul. Not once do they stand together; not one word do they speak to one another.Perhaps this armor longs to find its way to the other D.
how_to_acquire: Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D Hunter. Elden Ring Map hereObtained at end of D Hunter's questline.

name: Twinsage Glintstone Crown
description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy. Greatly increases intelligence to the detriment of HP and stamina. Scholars of the Twinsage Conspectus were the elites of the academy, permitted to study and excel in sorceries of all kinds.
special_effect: +6 Intelligence. Reduces max Stamina and max HP by 9%.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by a crab in Raya Lucaria Academy. Very close to Azur's Glintstone Staff. Elden Ring Map here

name: Vagabond Knight Helm
description: Helm of a knight banished from their motherland.Dirty and battered after enduring a lengthy vagabond journey. The visor is broken and can no longer be lowered. Metal armor is heavy, but also sturdy, offering significant damage negation.
how_to_acquire: A Starting Equipment Piece for the Vagabond Class.Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 1,000 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

name: Veteran's Helm
description: An old helm that has seen many battles.Worn by Niall, the great veteran general of Sol.Nial was a lone survivor who commanded spirits to defend his long-passed master.This aging general could not die, nor did he have anywhere to fade away.
how_to_acquire: Can be bought from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Commander Niall

name: Vulgar Militia Helm
description: Helm worn by lean, mean, and filthy militiamen. The upward extension serves to create an appearance of larger size, however slightly.
how_to_acquire: Can be found by killing Vulgar Militiamen enemies.

name: White Mask
description: "Bloodstained, faintly grinning mask.Worn by war surgeons who were effectively mercy killers.The Lord of Blood's curse enlivens the wearer when bloodletting occurs. Slightly raises attack power when there is blood loss nearby."
special_effect: Slightly raises attack power (10% for 20s) when there is blood loss nearby.
how_to_acquire: The entire War Surgeon Set is obtained after defeating all three Nameless White Mask NPC invaders in the blood swamp near the Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum.

name: Witch's Glintstone Crown
description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.Increases intelligence and arcane to the detriment of stamina.This gentle-looking crown was granted to a scholar who excelled in her studies, which also merited the title of "witch."
special_effect: +3 Intelligence. +3 Arcane. Reduces max Stamina by 18%.
how_to_acquire: Obtained by progressing in Sorceress Sellen's Questline. Elden Ring Map here

name: Zamor Mask
description: Mask worn by knights of Zamor, hailed as heroes in the War against the Giants. These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor fought at the Mountaintops of the Giants. Elden Ring Map here

name: Dryleaf Robe
description: Sun-faded and lightly soiled travel attire worn by clergymen. The gold necklace found under the breast belongs to a group of spiritual seekers known as the Dryleaf Sect. This sect rejects dependence on others in all matters of faith, seeking self-discipline and self-sufficiency above all else.
how_to_acquire: Found under a waterfall in the lower portions under Bonny Village. This area can only be accessed by using the ladder in Shadow Keep to get down to a special teleport coffin (this Elden Ring Map location). This will take you to Ruins of Unte and you must follow the cliffs downstream and then carefully drop down to bottom level to reach the mausoleum. [Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Dryleaf Robe (Altered)
description: Sun-faded and lightly soiled travel attire worn by clergymen. The leather satchel hanging from the shoulder is decorated with one of Miquella's emblems, a golden grass motif.
how_to_acquire: Alter Dryleaf Robe at any site of Grace.

name: Gaius's Armor
description: The black iron chest armor of Commander Gaius. Part of an armor set patterned after fallen seeds. Gaius was the most senior disciple of the same Alabaster Lord who taught Radahn and Gaea gravitational technique.
how_to_acquire: Purchased from the Enia at the Roundtable Hold after defeating Commander Gaius.

name: Leda's Armor
description: Chest armor of Needle Knight Leda. Slightly strengthens attacks following a dodge roll or backstep, as well as dash attacks. Embroidered with a golden crossed-tree motif, the chalk white cloak and surcoat symbolize the honor of the Needle Knights. "Kindly Miquella fashioned us as his needles to quell all, to ward away all."
special_effect: Slightly strengthens attacks following a dodge roll or backstep, as well as dash attacks.
how_to_acquire: Found on Needle Knight Leda's body after invading and defeating her

name: Oathseeker Knight Armor
description: Oathseeker Knight chest armor. Black with gold ornamentation. These knights set off on quests of discovery, hoping to find by themselves an oath of their own choosing to serve in perfect, lifelong devotion.
how_to_acquire: Found inside a hanging body, just outside the Church of Benediction. It contains the whole set: Oathseeker Knight Greaves, Oathseeker Knight Gauntlets, Oathseeker Knight Armor, and Oathseeker Knight Helm. It also contains Pata weapon. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Verdigris Armor
description: Chest armor made from an unusual metal known as verdigris. Verdigris is said to be the gift of an outer god. Possessed of an enormously hefty yet supple strength thanks to its rusted nature.
how_to_acquire: Complete Moore's questline

name: Iron Rivet Armor
description: Chest armor of Red Bear, whose name is lost to madness. A vest reinforced with iron rivets. After killing the great red bear in a blood-soaked bout, he became fascinated by the untainted glory of its naked strength. "I wish to be a bear, no more, and no less."
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Red Bear. Red Bear can be found at the Northern Nameless Mausoleum. The Northern Nameless Mausoleum is located East of the Temple Ruins. [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Thiollier's Garb
description: The dark attire of those who wield poison in secret. The silver hair is arranged in the same style as St. Trina's, increasing arcane. Additionally, countless needles are sewn onto the exterior, apparently for talismanic effect.
special_effect: Increases Arcane by +2
how_to_acquire: Summon Thiollier during the battle at the end of his questline, then loot his body in the boss arena after the fight

name: Thiollier's Garb (Altered)
description: The dark attire of those who wield poison in secret.Countless needles are sewn onto the exterior for talismanic effect.
how_to_acquire: Alter Thiollier's Garb at any site of grace.

name: High Priest Robe
description: Robe of Count Ymir, High Priest. Conceals the abundance of squirming beneath. Gold embroidery decorates the purple cloth, with a jewelled ruff that sparkles like a flower wet with dew.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Count Ymir, Mother of Fingers, who can be found in the Cathedral of Manus Metyr after interacting with the throne, you can only find Count Ymir there after you have defeated Metyr, Mother of Fingers. [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Finger Robe
description: Robe of Count Ymir, High Priest. The front is open, exposing the squirming fingers beneath. This robe is the image of his fervent desire having broken free, laying bare his greatest wish, and wearing it enhances finger sorceries. "I will be the true mother. My fingers will grant us redemption!"
special_effect: Enhances Finger Sorceries by 8%
how_to_acquire: Once you obtain the High Priest Robe you can alter it at a grace site to become this robe.

name: Braided Cord Robe
description: Ragged black cloth overlaid with braided cord. Attire of a vengeance-seeking hornsent. The braided cord ties together the vow of the revenger with the victims' grudges. It must never come undone. Enhances both watchful spirits and the vengeful spirits summoned by horned bairns.
special_effect: Enhances watchful and vengeful spirits summoned by horned bairns by 15%.
how_to_acquire: Complete Hornsent quest. [Video Location]

name: Dancer's Dress
description: Bright-red dress of the Ranah dancers. Enhances the power of dancing attacks. The dance of Ranah is one of burning passion, and the most passionate dancers never allow their fiery dance to end, losing even their names as they dance on. To see the passion fade is to see the dancer's flame extinguished.
special_effect: Enhances the power of dancing attacks by 2.5%.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by defeating Dancer of Ranah at the Southern Nameless Mausoleum [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Interactive Map]

name: Dancer's Dress (Altered)
description: Altered form of the deep crimson dress of the Ranah dancers. These are the black undergarments worn beneath. Enhances the power of dancing attacks.
special_effect: Enhances the power of dancing attacks by 2.5%.
how_to_acquire: Alter Dancer's Dress.

name: Armor of Night
description: Bottomless black chest armor, cool to the touch.Flowing lines in the seeming shape of a fingerprint adorn the surface. Imprisons the wearer in utterly lightless dark.Bestowed upon those born deep underground, ordaining them as Swordhands of Night.
how_to_acquire: Bonny Gaol: Use the jar lift near the bridge twice to reach the top level of the gaol. First, hop on the jar, go to the bridge level, and activate the switch. Ride the jar lift for the second time to go to the top level. You can find the Night Set on a corpse laying on top of a table. [See SOTE Elden Ring DLC Map] [Video Link]

name: Igon's Armor
description: Armor of the broken drake warrior Igon, from a set comprised of a miscellany of parts. Filthy belongings are attached to this tattered piece of protective-wear. The poor scavenger of battlefields found honor through Dragon Communion.
how_to_acquire: Loot Igon after defeating Bayle the Dread.

name: Igon's Armor (Altered)
description: Armor of the broken drake warrior Igon, from a set comprised of a miscellany of parts. Patched with scraps of cloth. The poor scavenger of battlefields found honor through Dragon Communion.
how_to_acquire: Alter Igon's Armor at a site of grace.

name: Ansbach's Attire
description: Attire of Sir Ansbach. The embroidered crest of the Pureblood Knights has now all but faded away. Slightly enhances Blood Oath and dynastic skills. Ansbach understood that keeping his oath to his old master was not an act of logic, nor would it bear any justice, but it was for these very reasons he was unable to let go.
special_effect: Slightly enhances Blood Oath and dynastic skills by 3%.
how_to_acquire: Complete Sir Ansbach's questline all the way through the end, and side with him when facing Leda, and then Promised Consort Radahn/ Radahn, Consort of Miquella. After the fight is over, Sir Ansbach's body will be near the site of grace, alongside with his equipment and his Incantation. [Map Link]

name: Ansbach's Attire (Altered)
description: Attire of Sir Ansbach. Black cloth adorned with gold embroidery. Slightly enhances Blood Oath and dynastic skills.
special_effect: Slightly enhances Blood Oath and dynastic skills by 3%.
how_to_acquire: Alter Ansbach's Atirre at a Site of Grace.

name: Freyja's Armor
description: Golden armor of Redmane Freyja, member of General Radahn's most distinguished knights. Affixed with a black woolen mantle. After witnessing Freyja's valor as a gladiator in his youth, Radahn invited her to join the ranks of his most trusted warriors.
how_to_acquire: Drop by Redmane Freyja.

name: Freyja's Armor (Altered)
description: Golden armor of Redmane Freyja, member of General Radahn's most distinguished knights. After witnessing Freyja's valor as a gladiator in his youth, Radahn invited her to join the ranks of his most trusted warriors.
how_to_acquire: Alter Freyja's Armor at any site of grace.

name: Armor of Solitude
description: Steel chest armor of the Knights of the Solitary Gaol. Part of a heavy armor set that covers the whole body in overlapping plates of steel, and bedecked with a black cloak. The nameless mausoleums of the realm of shadow are said to hold the spirits of warriors who lost their names, or their hearts.
how_to_acquire: Can be obtained after defeating the Blackgaol Knight found inside Northern Nameless Mausoleum. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Armor of Solitude (Altered)
description: Steel chest armor of the Knights of the Solitary Gaol. Part of a heavy armor set that covers the whole body in overlapping plates of steel. The nameless mausoleums of the realm of shadow are said to hold the spirits of warriors who lost their names, or their hearts.
how_to_acquire: Alter Armor of Solitude at any site of grace.

name: Messmer Soldier Armor
description: Armor worn by soldiers who serve Messmer the Impaler. A ragged cloak is draped over rusted mail. Though the chestpiece features a Scadutree motif, gold has been used for its engraving. A small consolation to those forced to wage a war without grace or honor.
how_to_acquire: Drop by Messmer Soldiers

name: Messmer Soldier Armor (Altered)
description: Armor worn by soldiers who serve Messmer the Impaler. The mail has rusted while fighting in unending war. Though the chestpiece features a Scadutree motif, gold has been used for its engraving. A small consolation to those forced to wage a war without grace or honor.
how_to_acquire: Alter Messmer Soldier Armor at any site of grace.

name: Black Knight Armor
description: Armor worn by the Black Knights, servants of Messmer the Impaler. Though the engraving above the heart is a Scadutree design, it is etched in gold. A small consolation to those forced to wage a war without grace or honor.
how_to_acquire: Black Knight Set pieces are dropped from Black Knights, found throughout the Lands of Shadow.

name: Rakshasa Armor
description: Armor of Rakshasa, soaked in the spurting blood of her victims. Tatters of ragged cloth jut out haphazardly, as if her lust for carnage threatens to break free.Increases damage dealt to foes, but greatly increases damage taken by the wearer.Cut down and devour. Only those who repeat the cycle without rest can truly subvert the self and become Rakshasa.
special_effect: Boosts All Damage by 2%
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Rakshasa in Eastern Nameless Mausoleum. This area can only be accessed by using the ladder in Shadow Keep to get down to a special teleport coffin (this Elden Ring Map location). This will take you to Ruins of Unte and you must follow the cliffs downstream and then carefully drop down to bottom level to reach the mausoleum. [Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Fire Knight Armor
description: Armor of the Fire Knights under Messmer the Impaler's personal command. Distinguished by its red cape and twin golden snakes which adorn the neck, enhancing incantations of Messmer's flame. These were the only ones who truly knew Messmer. His flames, like serpents. The painful fate that accompanied his accursed form.
special_effect: Enhances incantations of Messmer's flame by 5%.
how_to_acquire: Drop by Fire Knights in the Shadow Keep

name: Fire Knight Armor (Altered)
description: Armor of the Fire Knights under Messmer the Impaler's personal command. Each and every knight hailed from a renowned family of the Erdtree's upper echelons, but were shunned and chased from their homes after pledging allegiance to Messmer as their master.
how_to_acquire: Alter Fire Knight Armor at any site of grace.

name: Gloried Attire
description: Traditional garb of highland warriors, made from woven fabric and finished with fur. This garment is made from fabrics with both blue and red patterns. Red-patterned fabrics were allowed only to those who hunted bearsthe greatest and most glorious of the highlanders.
how_to_acquire: To the northwest of the Ravine North Site of Grace, there is a forest inhabited by runebears. At the center of this forest, you'll find a large stone with several items on it, this whole armor set is at the top of the stone. [Map Link]

name: Highland Attire
description: Traditional garb of highland warriors, made from woven fabric and finished with a blue patterned cloth. Highland warriors are known to be hunters of bears; to them, there is no act more glorious than the subjugation of a savage beast.
how_to_acquire: Found laying on the grounds in the middle of the woods, alongside the rest of the Highland Warrior Set. [Map Link]

name: Death Knight Armor
description: Golden armor of the Death Knights, adorned with an antiquated depiction of the Erdtree. Enhances skills and incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult. These knights, once Godwyn's personal guard, quested to find their transfigured master's cadaver surrogatefor the coming age of the Duskborn.
special_effect: Enhances skills and incantations of the ancient dragon cult by 2%.
how_to_acquire: Darklight Catacombs, on a Death Knight corpse

name: Messmer's Armor
description: Black armor of Messmer the Impaler. Draped with a red cloak bearing his crest embroidered. On his mother's wishes, Messmer made himself a symbol of fear, undertaking the cleansing crusade she desired. "Direct thy maledictions, thine ire, and thy grief towards me alone."
how_to_acquire: Purchase from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Messmer the Impaler

name: Gravebird's Blackquill Armor
description: Stone armor with a tinge of green. One of a set of armor pieces cast in the image of the Gravebird. Featuring a cape of black Deathbird feathers, it enhances jumping attacks. Gravebirds are ancient golems, created to guard the spiritgraves built where all manners of Death ultimately drift.
special_effect: Increases Jump attack damage by 10%
how_to_acquire: From the Temple Town Ruins site of grace head north, past the Red Pests servants of rot, and stick to the left. The path will start to head upwards and you will find several Gravebirds. Continue upwards and you will eventually reach an area where there are gravebird statues at the side, in the middle, against the wall, you will find the armor. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Gravebird Armor
description: Stone armor with a tinge of green. One of a set of armor pieces cast in the image of the Gravebird. Gravebirds are ancient golems, created to guard the spiritgraves built where all manners of Death ultimately drift.
how_to_acquire: In the area, there are four statues of Gravebirds, and at the end is where you'll find the Armor. Once you approach the statues, at least 3 of them will turn into enemies. This location is situated to the far west of the Abandoned Ailing Village, nearly reaching the outer walls of Belurat, Tower Settlement. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Common Soldier Cloth Armor
description: Cloth armor of the rank-and-file soldiers of Messmer's army. A pitch-dark soot clings to it, much like the inner faces of the men who wore them.
how_to_acquire: Drop by soldiers in Castle Ensis

name: Horned Warrior Armor
description: Armor of the horned warriors, keepers of the tower. The ochre fabric is draped over a chest-piece made to resemble the unclothed form of a hero from older times.
how_to_acquire: Drops from Horned Warriors ( Small Private Altar site of grace in Belurat, Tower Settlement)

name: Divine Beast Warrior Armor
description: Armor of feted horned warriors chosen to become divine beast warriors, adorned with a lion's pelt. Among the divine beast warriors, only those who truly excel at divine invocation become sculpted keepers, and are granted the honor of the lion dance.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Divine Beast Warriors, Enir Ilim

name: Divine Bird Warrior Armor
description: Armor of divine bird warriors, the very first of all horned warriors, made from a golden metal. The golden-hued divine birds are known to be cruel, never taking to human companionship. Those who invoked their divinity were few and far between.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Divine Bird Warriors

name: Rellana's Armor
description: Ornate armor of Rellana, the Twin Moon Knight, fashioned from silver steel. Adorned with the lapis-lazuli blue that is symbolic of Caria, its radiance is yet to fully fade.
how_to_acquire: The complete set (Rellana's Set) can be bought from Enia in the Roundtable Hold upon defeating Rellana Twin Moon Knight.

name: Young Lion's Armor
description: The golden armor worn by Radahn in his younger years. Proudly adorned with heroic red accents, it is fitting attire for a lion. When Malenia, Blade of Miquella, let the rotflower blossom in Aeonia, Radahn heard a murmur in his ear "Miquella awaits thee, O promised consort."
how_to_acquire: Purchase from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Promised Consort Radahn / Radahn, Consort of Miquella in Enir-Ilim [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Young Lion's Armor (Altered)
description: The golden armor worn by Radahn in his younger years. Worn by a fierce lion. When Malenia, Blade of Miquella, let the rotflower blossom in Aeonia, Radahn heard a murmur in his ear "Miquella awaits thee, O promised consort."
how_to_acquire: Alter Young Lion's Armor at any site of grace.

name: Shadow Militiaman Armor
description: Armor as dark as shadow, worn by vulgar militiamen. Freshly-singed battlegrounds effusing with the stench of the dead. Forbidden lands that will be excised from the memory of history. What better place than the realms of shadow then, for such an army?
how_to_acquire: can be found by killing Shadow Militiaman enemies

name: Ascetic's Loincloth
description: Attire of the tower's ascetics, embodying their commitment to an austere existence of strict self-control. In order to ascend from their mortal flesh into tutelary deities of the land, they heighten their spirituality through severe ascetic training.
how_to_acquire: Drop by Curseblade enemies.

name: All-Knowing Armor
description: Armor set with countless eyes and ears. Worn by Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing. Knowledge begins with the recognition of one's ignorance. The realization that the search for knowledge is unending. But when Gideon glimpsed into the will of Queen Marika, he shuddered in fear. At the end that should not be.
how_to_acquire: The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing upon defeat. Sir Gideon is encountered as a boss in Leyndell, Capital of Ash, an alternate version of the Royal Capital accessible only after making significant progress in the storyElden Ring Map here

name: Alberich's Robe
description: Mad Tongue Alberich's robe.Set with red glintstones said to be formed by the blood of sacrifices. Strengthens thorn sorcery. Alberich was an aloof yet disturbed heretical sorcerer said to have been driven mad by jeering tongues during his service to the Roundtable Hold long ago.
special_effect: Strengthens thorn sorcery
how_to_acquire: The entire Alberich's Set can be found in the main hall of the Fortified manor in Leyndell, Royal Capital, near the Fortified Manor, first floor Site of Grace. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Aristocrat Coat
description: Tanned leather coat adorned with fine gold embroidery. Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital, and the belonging of a family which claims a knight as an ancestor. Abandoning their birthplace after the Shattering, these undead wanderers are the pitiful product of unending life.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Undead Soldiers

name: Aristocrat Garb
description: High quality garb adorned with fine golden embroidery. Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital. Terribly faded and tattered.Abandoning their birthplace after the Shattering, these undead wanderers are the pitiful product of unending life.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Undead Soldiers

name: Astrologer Robe
description: Robe fashioned from supple cloth. Worn by those who look to the cosmos above. They read fate in the stars, and are said to be heirs of the glintstone sorcerers. But alas, the night sky no longer cradles fate.
how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Astrologer Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for 1500 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

name: Azur's Glintstone Robe
description: A robe reserved for grand masters at the Academy of Raya Lucaria.Corroded by blue-green glintstones.Since the grand masters Azur and Lusat were driven from the academy, no one has achieved their formerly-held rank.
how_to_acquire: After completing Sorceress Sellen's Questline, return to Primeval Sorcerer Azur's location. Azur's Glintstone Robe will be on the floor where Azur used to be, along with the rest of the set.Elden Ring Map here

name: Bandit Garb
description: Leather garb worn by bandits.Light for ease of movement, and supple for masking sound. In trade, they offer little damage negation.
how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class.Gatekeeper Gostoc will sell it after entering Stormveil Castle, but before killing Godrick the Grafted. Elden Ring Map hereCan be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after offering Gostoc's Bell Bearing.

name: Banished Knight Armor
description: Thick, full set of armor covering the entire body. This armor was worn by knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes. These fierce warriors were each and all accomplished. Perhaps that is why, despite their territorial losses, they were still named knights.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Banished Knights

name: Beast Champion Armor
description: Silver armor engraved with tiny beasts. Worn by Bernahl the Recusant. Beasts are drawn to champions, and to lords. And this armor befits a champion worthy of becoming a lord. And that is what Bernahl was. Until his maiden threw herself into the fire.
how_to_acquire: Drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. If not killed before, he will eventually invade you at Crumbling Farum Azula, dropping the entire set with an altered version of the chest piece. Elden Ring Map here

name: Black Knife Armor
description: Scale armor used by the Black Knife Assassins, forged to make no sound. Traces of power yet remain in its concealing veil, which muffles the sound of footsteps. The assassins that carried out the deeds of the Night of the Black Knives were all women, and rumored to be Numen who had close ties with Marika herself.
special_effect: Wearer's movement becomes silent, Rolls, jumping and walking make no noise
how_to_acquire: Can be found on a corpse under an archway behind Ordina, Liturgical Town in Consecrated Grounds.Elden Ring Map here

name: Blackflame Monk Armor
description: Black iron armor adorned with ashen cloth.Attire of the Blackflame Monks.The Blackflame Monks, enthralled by the god-slaying black flame, became traitors, abandoning their posts as guardians. The seduction of a taboo is never easily spurned.
how_to_acquire: Drop from Blackflame Monks.

name: Bloodhound Knight Armor
description: Metal armor with a jutting breastplate. Worn by the Bloodhound Knights. The Bloodhound Knights are trained as hunters and known to be unshakable trackers. Without the use of language, each knight chooses his own master. Once the decision has been made, the knight stays loyal for life.
how_to_acquire: The entire Bloodhound Knight Set drops in Gelmir Hero's Grave - Mt. Gelmir. Dropped by the Bloodhound Knight guarding the Gelmir Knight Set pickup. The set must then be picked up from the corpse of the Knight. Elden Ring Map here

name: Blue Cloth Vest
description: Vest of a nomadic warrior. The blue color of its fabric symbolizes brisk waters, as fluid and flowing as the sword in the hand of its wearer.Just as still waters turn foul, stagnation leads to decay. Warriors must remain ever drifting.
how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Warrior Class.Purchasable from Isolated Merchant (Raya Lucaria).Elden Ring Map here

name: Blue Silver Mail Armor
description: Chainmail armor crafted with blue silver. Worn by the wolf-riding Albinauric archers. Blue silver is a metal born from the same mother as the archers themselves, and provides protection from magic and frost.
how_to_acquire: Drop from Albinauric archers at Ordina, Liturgical Town.

name: Briar Armor
description: Battered iron armor from a foreign land.Worn by Elemer of the Briar. The winding, rusted iron briars are a mark of the guilty and typically indicate a sentence of death. They also cause this armor to deal damage when performing dodge rolls.Elemer murdered numerous instructors and merchants, and was known as the Bell Bearing Hunter.
special_effect: Deals damage when rolling into targets. Damage increases exponentially with more briar pieces
how_to_acquire: Purchased from the Palm Reader in Roundtable Hold after defeating Elemer of the Briar in The Shaded Castle

name: Bull-Goat Armor
description: Great Horned Tragoth's armor. Covers its wearer with a pair of giant horns, providing staunch poise. Tragoth is a famed knight of assistance. Countless Tarnished, facing adversity in the Lands Between, have survived thanks only to the Great Horned One's aid.
how_to_acquire: Can be found after killing Patches' assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Great Horned Tragoth.Elden Ring Map here

name: Carian Knight Armor
description: Armor of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family.The enchanted knights, anointed by the Lunar Queen, were heroes of the highest honors, but fell into disarray with the decline of the royal family.
how_to_acquire: Found in a chest behind Sorceress Sellen, in Ruined Cellar, Post Town Remains.You can find the Carian Knight Set in Raya Lucaria Academy.Elden Ring Map hereTo find the Carian Knight Set, you will need to fast travel back to the Church of the Cuckoo site and head to the graveyard section, specifically where the large rotating lift is. On the right side of the gate's entrance, look down as you are hugging the wall to find a platform that you can drop to. Walk on the narrow path and you'll notice a group of Glintstone Zombies worshipping a statue, simply kill the enemies and pick up the glowing item next to the statue to receive the set.

name: Chain Armor
description: Armor made of woven chain. Standard issue for ordinary soldiers. Though plain in appearance, it offers dependable protection.
how_to_acquire: Can be found at Church of Elleh, purchased from Merchant Kale. It costs 1500 Runes.Elden Ring Map hereCan be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Kale's Bell Bearing.

name: Chain-Draped Tabard
description: Padded cloth armor with a chainmail shawl draped over the shoulders. Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Soldiers.

name: Champion Pauldron
description: Pauldron reserved for the badlands' bravest. Proof that the wearer has slaughtered countless foes. Following the example of their chieftain Hoarah Loux, the brave warriors of the badlands shun excess adornment.
how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Hero Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in south Caelid for 1,500 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

name: Cleanrot Armor
description: Armor of the Cleanrot Knights, celebrated for their undefeated campaign in the Shattering.The Cleanrot Knights vowed to fight alongside Malenia, despite the inevitable, if gradual, putrefaction of their flesh. Their acceptance of their fate made these battles fiercest of all.
how_to_acquire: Drops from Cleanrot Knights in Inner Aeonia, Caelid.

name: Cloth Garb
description: Clothing made of coarse material, commonly worn in the Lands Between.
how_to_acquire: Found at the chest located at the end of Murkwater Cave, alongside Cloth Trousers.Elden Ring Map here

name: Commoner's Garb
description: Garb with a thick embroidered cape attached.Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between.The board hung from the neck depicts a sprawling tree, its rootsand branches forming two holes. This is a self-imposed shackle, avoluntary display of allegiance to the Erdtree that increases faith.
special_effect: +1 Faith
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Commoner enemies found in Stormveil Castle, Leyndell, Royal Capital, and other areas of the map.

name: Commoner's Simple Garb
description: Garb with a modest cloth cape attached. Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between. The board hung from the neck depicts a sprawling tree, its roots and branches forming two holes. This is a self-imposed shackle, a voluntary display of allegiance to the Erdtree that increases faith.
special_effect: +1 Faith
how_to_acquire: Location: Stormveil Castle.Elden Ring Map hereLooted off a corpse that is located at the balcony of the inner gatehouse of the castle's main gate. The safest way to reach this room is by entering through the back of the castle since the enemies that are guarding the main gate and the front won't expect you to be coming in from behind.

name: Confessor Armor
description: Black leather armor for blending in with the darkness. Worn by church confessors. The churches outside the Lands Between, dedicated to the teachings of the Two Fingers, send confessors out to follow the guidance of grace. The confessors are loyal servants to the Two Fingers, ready to hunt down and quietly dispose of their enemies.
how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Confessor Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for 1500 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

name: Crucible Axe Armor
description: Armor of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. Worn by the knight Ordovis and his men. Holds the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations.
special_effect: Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis.Elden Ring Map here

name: Crucible Tree Armor
description: Armor of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. Worn by the knight Siluria and her men. Holds the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations.
special_effect: Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations
how_to_acquire: The whole set is found in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind a Boss: Crucible Knight Siluria. Elden Ring Map here

name: Cuckoo Surcoat
description: Armor worn by Raya Lucaria Academy soldiers. The surcoat depicts twinned cuckoos peering into a flourishing mass of glintstone. To a glintstone sorcerer, the body is a transient thing. The Cuckoo alone knows its insignificance, yet watches over it all the same.
how_to_acquire: Drops from Raya Lucaria Soldiers.Easily farmed from the Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Caria Manor after the Manor Lower Level site of grace.

name: Deathbed Dress
description: Extremely thin and sheer white dress worn by the Deathbed Companion as she embraces the dead.Slowly replenishes the HP of nearby allies, but not that of the wearer.The touch of the fabric is exceedingly soft, so as not to harm even the most withered corpse, while still sharing her warmth.
special_effect: Slowly replenishes the HP of nearby allies, but not that of the wearer.
how_to_acquire: Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital.Elden Ring Map here

name: Depraved Perfumer Robe
description: Robe worn by depraved perfumers.The embroidery on the apron is itself a curse upon the Erdtree.These heresy-inclined perfumers imbibe their own spices to alter body and mind. Their slow descent into self-destruction is what earned them their name.
how_to_acquire: Acquire this from the enemy directly up the hill from the site of grace at the Village of the Albinaurics. He is the enemy who wields fire, you may have to kill him a few times to get it.The Depraved Perfumer Set can also be farmed from the Depraved Perfumer enemies located around The Shaded Castle.

name: Eccentric's Armor
description: Unusually colorful armor. Worn by the knight Jerren. Jerren preferred a nomadic existence, but after spending time as a guest of the Carian royals, he became a guest commander for General Radahn. And for the first time, the restless tumbleweed would be bound by honorable oath.
how_to_acquire: Drops for defeating Witch-Hunter Jerren.Elden Ring Map here

name: Elden Lord Armor
description: Armor of Godfrey the first Elden Lord.The age of the Erdtree began amongst conflict, when Godfrey was lord of the battlefield.He led the War against the Giants. Faced the Storm Lord, alone. And then, there came a moment. When his last worthy enemy fell. And it was then, as the story is told, that the hue of Lord Godfrey's eyes faded.
how_to_acquire: Available from Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Godfrey, First Elden Lord and Hoarah Loux, Warrior.

name: Erdtree Surcoat
description: Armor worn by soldiers sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell. The surcoat bears a majestic likeness of the Erdtree. Its golden backing is an honor bestowed on no other soldiers.
how_to_acquire: The Erdtree Surcoat Chest Armor occasionally drops from Leyndell Soldiers.

name: Errant Sorcerer Robe
description: Commonplace robe made of thick cloth. Worn by the Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm, one of the first Tarnished to visit Roundtable Hold. A silent seeker of sorcery, who had gone so far as to make contact with the primeval current, Wilhelm was led by guidance into confrontation with his friend Vargram, and it is said that he was then taken prisoner in Roundtable Hold.
how_to_acquire: Looted off a corpse in Hermit Village, Mt. Gelmir. The corpse is found in a house in the northeast corner of the village.Elden Ring Map here.

name: Exile Armor
description: Damaged armor draped with a large deep-red cloth. Worn by soldiers sent to the penal colonies.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Castle Guards

name: Eye Surcoat
description: Brown surcoat draped over chainmail. The insignia emblazoned on the front marks out the wearer as the eyes and ears of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing.
how_to_acquire: Eye Surcoat can be found on the ground in the boss arena of Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy. Elden Ring Map here.

name: Fia's Robe
description: Robe of black cloth that covers the entire body.Worn by Fia, the Deathbed Companion, on her journey after being exiled from her home.The fabric itself is soft as silk and thin enough that those embraced can feel every pulse; every bit of her warmth.
how_to_acquire: Found on Fia's location after progressing her questline and defeating Lichdragon Fortissax.

name: Fia's Robe (Altered)
description: Worn by Fia, the Deathbed Companion, on her journey after being exiled from her home.
how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Fia's Robe if you have it in your possession.

name: Fell Omen Cloak
description: "A cloak of ragged fur worn about the exposed body of Margit, the Fell Omen.Having slaughtered countless champions during the Shattering, the Fell Omen has become a horror to those who harbor ambitions for the Erdtree, or for Lordship."
how_to_acquire: The Fell Omen Cloak Chest Armor can be purchased from Enia in the Roundtable Hold after the player has defeated Morgott.

name: Finger Maiden Robe
description: Robe worn by maidens who serve the Two Fingers. The maidens live to serve a chosen Tarnished, sharing their guidance and the wisdom of the Two Fingers. The guidance of grace would ensure that the pair be brought together. Or at least, such was the promise long ago.
how_to_acquire: Can be found inside Church of Inhibition directly beside a Grace. Run past NPC invader to touch Grace first.Elden Ring Map here

name: Fire Monk Armor
description: Black iron armor adorned with a red cloth.Attire of the Fire Monks.The grotesque face sculpted on the chest is said to depict the corrupt ancient god of the flame.Taboos transform into lasting obsessions by virtue of the fear that they inspire.
how_to_acquire: Pieces of the Fire Monk armor set are dropped by Fire Monk Abbots found at a few camps and patrols in Liurnia of the Lakes.

name: Fur Raiment
description: Raiment fashioned from a bristly pelt.Worn by ancestral follower warriors.The ancestral followers keep their distance from the Erdtree,awaiting new buds. They are certain to sprout from their veryflesh, and indeed, their souls.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Ancestral Follower.

name: Gelmir Knight Armor
description: Armor worn by knights once loyal to Praector Rykard.It bears an emblem that none wear any longer, standing as it does for a lord that fell from loft ambition into gluttonous depravity. As the lord lost his dignity, so too did these knights lose their master.
how_to_acquire: You can loot the entire Gelmir Knight Set in the Gelmir Hero's Grave dungeon from a Gelmir Knight corpse. Elden Ring Map here.

name: Godrick Knight Armor
description: Armor worn by knights loyal to Godrick The Grafted.Its left breast is emblazoned with a two-headed war axe, an emblem of the golden lineage. The knights surely boasted of their strength in days long gone.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Godrick Knights.

name: Godskin Apostle Robe
description: Robe made by sewing together patches of smooth skin.Worn by the Godskin Apostles.The apostles, once said to serve Destined Death, are wielders of the god-slaying black flame. But after their defeat by Maliketh, the Black Blade, the source of their power was sealed away.
how_to_acquire: Defeating Godskin Apostle, located at the bottom of Divine Tower of Caelid.Elden Ring Map here

name: Tree-and-Beast Surcoat
description: Armor worn by soldiers loyal to Godrick the Grafted.The surcoat depicts the distant Erdtree and the beast regent, an emblem of the golden lineage.Both are symbols of glory now past.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Godrick Soldiers.Easily farmed at the Gatefront Ruins.

name: Haligtree Crest Surcoat
description: Armor worn by soldiers sworn to the Haligtree. The surcoat bears the crest of the Haligtree. Though watered with Miquella's own blood since it was a sapling, the Haligtree ultimately failed to grow into an Erdtree.
how_to_acquire: Haligtree Soldiers drop all pieces of the set. They are located throughout all areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

name: Highwayman Cloth Armor
description: Hideously stained and ragged cloth armor.Worn by former foot soldiers who have turned to banditry.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by the Bandits found in Murkwater Cave.

name: Hoslow's Armor
description: Garish silver armor decorated with red embellishments. Passed down through the Hoslow family. When Juno Hoslow received an invitation to the Volcano Manor, he discreetly refused. "I have already walked many a road drenched in blood, yet never would I consider myself a champion."
how_to_acquire: All pieces of Hoslow's Set are dropped by Juno Hoslow along with Hoslow's Petal Whip as part of the final contract for the Volcano Manor questline.Juno Hoslow is a Hostile NPC that you can invade after progressing through the questline. His invade rune be found in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants, east of Shack of the Lofty.Elden Ring Map here

name: Juvenile Scholar Robe
description: Robe worn by young academy scholars, the juveniles birthed anew by the amber egg of Queen Rennala, the head of Raya Lucaria Academy. Yet their rebirth is not without imperfections, and thus do they repeat the process, eventually becoming utterly dependent upon it. Rebirth is as sleep to them, and with each awakening, memory fades into oblivion.
how_to_acquire: Collect the Resurrection Painting from the Artist's Shack in eastern Liurnia. Elden Ring Map LinkWith the painting on hand, head to the graveyard area east of Caria Manor. This location is only accessible after completing the manor and defeating Royal Knight Loretta. The item is found by touching a ghost sitting on a chair at the graveyard. The ghost disappears as soon as you touch it and the Juvenile Scholar Robe will appear on the ground along with a Juvenile Scholar Cap and 1 x Larval Tear. Elden Ring Map Link

name: Knight Armor
description: Iron armor of an unknown knight. It is made of thin iron plate. Such metal armor is heavy, but provides considerable damage negation.
how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from the Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold for 4,500 Runes.

name: Kaiden Armor
description: Armor worn by Kaiden sellswords. These hulking, fearless mercenaries, said to hail from the mountaintops of the wintry north, are adept at fighting on horseback. Kaiden is the name of their home settlement.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Northern Mercenaries and Mounted Northern Mercenaries found in Limgrave.

name: Land of Reeds Armor
description: Armor made from strips of iron fastened together. Worn by warriors of the Land of Reeds. The grimy outer mantle is made from withered reeds from the warrior's birthplace.Perhaps its comforts extend to nostalgic thoughts of home.Altered:The Land of Reeds has long been locked in a miserable civil war, during which time it has remained alienated from the cultures of its neighbors. Little wonder that the entire nation has succumbed to the blood-soaked madness, or so it has said.
how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class.Sold by Isolated Merchant Dragonbarrow for 1,500 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

name: Leather-Draped Tabard
description: Padded cloth armor with a leather shawl draped over the shoulders.Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.
how_to_acquire: Chance to drop from regular Soldier enemies found in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: Lionel's Armor
description: Round iron armor with a banner extending from its back. Worn by the Lionel the Lionhearted. When this chivalrous dauntless knight met Fia, who had been driven from her home, he declared himself to be her father.
how_to_acquire: Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital.Elden Ring Map here

name: Lord of Blood's Robe
description: Attire of Mohg, Lord of Blood, embroidered with an extravagant gold emblem on black cloth. The dress of a Luminary, the reigning lord and hierarch of the coming dynasty of Mohgwyn. Or perhaps, of a raving lunatic.
how_to_acquire: This becomes available for purchase for 20,000 Runes from Enia at Roundtable Hold after you defeat Mohg, Lord of Blood.

name: Malformed Dragon Armor
description: Malformed golden armor. Adorned with various dragon imagery and worn by the misshapen Tree Sentinels. After the great ancient dragon Gransax attacked, the sentinels had an epiphany. The only way to truly protect the Erdtree was to become dragons themselves.
how_to_acquire: Can be obtained from killing the Tree Sentinel up the stairs from the Beside the Great Bridge site of grace. Elden Ring Map here

name: Maliketh's Armor
description: Beast's armor made of black iron and decorated with gold. Worn by Maliketh the Black Blade. Maliketh, Queen Marika's loyal half-brother, bore a blade imbued with Destined Death, and there was not one demigod who did not fear him. Champions knew what was at stake. Indeed, that is what made them champions.
how_to_acquire: Bought from the Palm Reader in the Roundtable Hold after defeating Maliketh, the Black Blade.

name: Marais Robe
description: Robe with a black mantle across the shoulders. Customarily worn by the head of House Marais.The sons of House Marais are all sickly born. Little wonder that Maleigh Marais would be so beguiled by the beautiful and fierce goddess who was born into rot.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan in the fields west of The Shaded Castle. Elden Ring Map here

name: Millicent's Robe
description: Robe worn by Millicent the Rotting
how_to_acquire: This armor piece is not currently obtainable.

name: Millicent's Tunic
description: Tunic worn by Millicent the Rotting
how_to_acquire: This armor piece is not currently obtainable.

name: Mushroom Body
description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body. These overgrown mushroom have colonized the torso. To those enraptured by the scarlet rot, they are holy vestments that root one to the earth.
how_to_acquire: Found in a cavern in Seethewater Cave filled with mushroom people and a Giant Poison Flower.Elden Ring Map here

name: Noble's Traveling Garb
description: Traveling attire fashioned from metallic white silk thread. Worn by expatriated royalty. A gift of such rare beauty, a royal wouldn't disgrace their illustrious heritage even if found dead, in a ditch, in the middle of nowhere, while wearing such splendid raiment.
how_to_acquire: The Noble's Traveling Garb along with other pieces of the Noble's Set can be found at East Windmill Pasture, Altus Plateau, in a burning pile of corpses surrounded by a circle of dancing women. Elden Ring Map here.

name: Old Aristocrat Gown
description: Gown of soft cloth adorned with fine gold embroidery. Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital. Garb favored by the aged. Abandoning their birthplace after the Shattering, these undead wanderers are the pitiful product of unending life.
how_to_acquire: All pieces of the Old Aristocrat Set are dropped by the Old Aristocrat enemies, often found within larger groups of Aristocrats wandering the roads of most areas. The green cowl makes them easily distinguishable from other Aristocrats.

name: Omenkiller Robe
description: Robe worn by the Omenkillers, butchers of twisted conscience. Its thick apron is worn in remembrance Rollo, the progenitor of the Omenkillers and a perfumer of antiquity.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by an Omenkiller enemy at Perfumer's Ruins, together with Omenkiller Long Gloves and Omenkiller Boots. Elden Ring Map here.

name: Perfumer's Traveling Garb
description: Garb of a traveling perfumer of no renown. An associate of a healer, he is said to be in search of new aromatics and flower gardens, in hopes of treating Misbegotten, Omen and all those seen as impure.
how_to_acquire: Found in a corpse in one of the corners of the buildings within Street of Sages Ruins, in Caelid's Swamp area, alongside the entire Perfumer Traveler's Set.Elden Ring Map here

name: Preceptor's Long Gown
description: A long, bright blue gown with the movements of the stars drawn upon it. Worn by the magic preceptors who served the Carian royals. Glintstone sorcerers are the descendants of astrologers, a fact that the Carians remain aware of. Even if their fate has been long severed from the stars.
how_to_acquire: Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline. Elden Ring Map here

name: Prisoner Clothing
description: Tattered clothing. Worn by a prisoner convicted of an appalling crime. Never once washed, every fiber is filthy.
how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Prisoner Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Ainsel River for 1500 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

name: Prophet Robe
description: Robe of exiled prophets who foretold misfortune and were persecuted and driven from their homes as a result. The shackles around the neck warn passersby not to lend an ear to their sermons.Altered:Made from rough fabric that scrapes against the slin like a sharpening file.
how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Prophet Class.Can be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for 1,500 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

name: Queen's Robe
description: Robe indicating the highest order of sorcerer. Worn by Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon. When Rennala, head of both the Academy of Raya Lucaria and the Carian royal family, lost her husband Radagon, her heart went along with him. And then, those at the academy realized. That Rennala was no champion, after all.
how_to_acquire: The Queen's Robe can be purchased to Enia in Roundtable Hold for 10,000 Need to defeat Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon Bossfight first.

name: Radahn's Lion Armor
description: Armor depicting the golden lion.Worn by General Radahn.The golden lion is said to symbolize Godfrey, the Elden Lord, and his beast regent, Serosh. From his youngest years, Radahn was naturally captivated by the Lord of the Battlefield.
how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for 12,000 runes once Starscourge Radahn has been defeated.

name: Raging Wolf Armor
description: Armor worn by Vargram the Raging Wolf, one of the first Tarnished to visit the Roundtable Hold. According to the old legends, wolves are the shadows of the Empyrean. Vargram aspired to such a state himself.
how_to_acquire: Leyndell Royal Capital. After obtaining the second to last letter from Volcano Manor, You will be sent to assist Bernahl with an invade in a familiar location. On completion of the invade, You will receive the full Raging Wolf set. Elden Ring Map here.

name: Raya Lucarian Robe
description: Robe worn by Raya Lucaria's magic scholars. Those who dedicate themselves to the study of glintstones formed from starry amber receive this modest yet elegant deep blue garb along with their vows of virtue and austerity. But with extended life, one is apt to forget old vows.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Raya Lucaria Sorcerer in Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak
description: Thick, bristly cloak eaten through by scarlet rot.The symbol of an underground gravekeeper's station. Altered:Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum.The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes.
special_effect: Increases likelihood of being targeted by foes
how_to_acquire: Dropped by the boss of Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs in Consecrated Snowfield, Putrid Grave Warden Duelist.Elden Ring Map here

name: Ruler's Robe
description: Luxurious robe worn by lords in a smaller nation. Its fine blue mantle serves to prove its wearer's status.
how_to_acquire: Can be found on a corpse laying face-down on a carriage northeast of the Abandoned Coffin site of grace in west Altus Plateau, alongside the Ruler's Mask. Elden Ring Map here

name: Sage Robe
description: Thick burgundy robe. Attire of the wise sages who were deemed heretical. Evidence that the wearer was driven from town.
how_to_acquire: Can be found in Stillwater Cave - Liurnia of the Lakes, just ahead and below the Lake Facing Cliffs, it's all sitting on a poison submerged corpse near the entrance, guarded by Giant Bats that will attack you when you take it. Elden Ring Map here

name: Sanguine Noble Robe
description: Robe of dyed black cloth featuring gold embroidery. Worn by the nobles who serve the Lord of Blood. The grand metallic pattern on the shoulder is a signifier of the noble rank they intend to claim upon the advent of the new dynasty they are working to install.
how_to_acquire: The entire Noble Robe Set is dropped by Sanguine Noble NPC invasion in west Mountaintops of The Giants.Elden Ring Map here.

name: Scale Armor
description: Armor reinforced with small metal scales. The cape covering the shoulders is made with treated rock lizard skin, and provides ample protection against fire.
how_to_acquire: Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for 2400 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

name: Scaled Armor
description: Armor worn by Old Knight Istvan.The corroded metal is reinforced with rock-hard scales, making it high effective against non-physical attacks.Istvan is one of a few wizened Tarnished who survived to this day.
how_to_acquire: Can be found after killing the first assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Old Knight Istvan. Elden Ring Map here

name: Snow Witch Robe
description: Witch's robe in the color of snow. Once worn by the snowy crone who the young Ranni encountered deep in the woods. She was a witch, and well versed in cold sorceries. It is said that the doll that houses Ranni's soul was modeled after her. That old witch was Ranni's secret mentor.
how_to_acquire: Found in a chest on the upper floor of Renna's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline. Elden Ring Map here

name: Traveling Maiden Robe
description: Robe worn by traveling maidens. Maidens traversed the Lands Between for different reasons. Some to seek audience with the Fingers. Others, to find the Tarnished who they were destined to guide.
how_to_acquire: On a corpse inside the Shack of The Lofty in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants. The rest of the set can also be looted here. Elden Ring Map here

name: Twinned Armor
description: Armor depicting entwined twins of gold and silver. The two known as D are inseparable twins.They are of two bodies and two minds, but one single soul. Not once do they stand together; not one word do they speak to one another.Perhaps this armor longs to find its way to the other D.
how_to_acquire: Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D, Hunter of the Dead. Elden Ring Map here

name: Upper-Class Robe
description: Embroidered, bright green robe worn by noble children. Donning such a robe is traditionally the child's first show of burgeoning independence.
how_to_acquire: Can be found at Leyndell Royal Capital, at the end of the passageway where you fight a few Perfumers.Elden Ring Map hereCan be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for 2,400 Runes.

name: Vagabond Knight Armor
description: Chest piece of a knight banished from their motherland. Dirty and battered after enduring a lengthy vagabond journey.The crest emblazoned on the front is worn and dingy, no longer able to evoke sentiment.Metal armor is heavy, but also study ordering significant damage negation.
how_to_acquire: Starting Equipment for the Vagabond Class.Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 1,500 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

name: Veteran's Armor
description: Old armor that has seen many battles. Worn by Niall, the veteran general of Sol. Niall was a lone survivor who commanded spirits to defend his long-passed master. This aging general could not die, nor did he have anywhere to fade away.
how_to_acquire: Can be purchased from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after killing Commander Niall at Castle Sol Rooftop.

name: White Reed Armor
description: Armor of the White Reeds, fashioned from banded iron plates. Worn by the Inaba, head disciples of the great swordsman Okina. The Inaba traveled in pursuit of not only the master who abandoned them, but also proper deaths, won honorably through hard-fought combat. To be a White Reed is to seek death; fitting for the Inaba, who desired nothing more than to die by the sword.
how_to_acquire: Spiritcaller's Cave in the Mountaintops of the Giants: Found on a corpse in a long cavern filled with spirit wolves. The White Reed Gauntlets and White Reed Greaves can also be found on this corpse.Elden Ring Map here

name: Zamor Armor
description: Armor worn by knights of Zamor, hailed as heroes in the War against the Giants. These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor fought at the Mountaintops of the Giants.Elden Ring Map here

name: Marionette Soldier Armor
description: Armor of metal bands arranged in a lattice.Worn by marionette soldiers, crafted to serve the sorcerers.The construction of this armor is remarkably crude, now rusted over and severely dented.For a doll, the only thing that matters is that it does not break.
how_to_acquire: Dropped by Marionette Soldier fought at Witchbane Ruins.

name: Alberich's Robe (Altered)
description: Mad Tongue Alberich's robe. Alberich was an aloof yet disturbed heretical sorcerer said to have been driven mad by jeering tongues during his service to the Roundtable Hold long ago.
how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Alberich's Robe if you have it in your possession.

name: All-Knowing Armor (Altered)
description: Armor set with countless eyes and ears. Worn by Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing. Knowledge begins with the recognition of one's ignorance. The realization that the search for knowledge is unending. But when Gideon glimpsed into the will of Queen Marika, he shuddered in fear. At the end that should not be.
how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter All-Knowing Armor into All-Knowing Armor (Altered).

name: Aristocrat Garb (Altered)
description: High quality garb adorned with fine golden embroidery.Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital. Terribly faded and tattered.Abandoning their birthplace after the Shattering, these pitiful wanderers are the pitiful product of unending life.
how_to_acquire: Drops from the Aristocrat enemies found wandering the roads in most areas.An early spot to farm them is the traveling carriage escort on the road north of the Agheel Lake South site of grace.

name: Astrologer Robe (Altered)
description: Robe fashioned from supple cloth. Worn by those who look to the cosmos above. They read fate in the stars, and are said to be heirs of the glintstone sorcerers. But alas, the night sky no longer cradles fate.
how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Astrologer Robe into Astrologer Tobe (Altered).

name: Banished Knight Armor (Altered)
description: Thick, full set of armor covering the entire body. This armor was worn by knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes. These fierce warriors were each and all accomplished. Perhaps that is why, despite their territorial losses, they were still named knights.
how_to_acquire: Stormveil Castle. Dropped by the Banished Knight in the room with the human limbs hanging from the roof.Cathedral of Dragon Communion. Dropped by the Banished Knight patrolling the perimeter of the Cathedral.

name: Battlemage Robe
description: Robe worn by scholars of the Raya Lucaria Academy, tattered from being worn on the battlefield.Whenever war broke out and the academy sealed its gates, only Haima's scholars dared venture outside. Seclusion is no way to foster discovery; it is only a convenient form of escape.
how_to_acquire: This piece is dropped by Battlemage enemies.

name: Beast Champion Armor (Altered)
description: Silver armor engraved with tiny beasts.Worn by Bernahl the Recusant.Beasts are drawn to champions, and to lords. And this armor befits a champion worthy of becoming a lord. And that is what Bernahl was.Until his maiden threw herself into the fire.
how_to_acquire: Drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. If not killed before, he will eventually invade you at Crumbling Farum Azula, dropping the entire set with an altered version of the chest piece. Elden Ring Map here.

name: Black Knife Armor (Altered)
description: Armor used by the Black Knife Assassins. Crafted with scale armor that makes no sound. The assassins that carried out the deeds of the Night of the Black Knives were all women, and rumored to be Numen who had close ties with Marika herself.
how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Black Knife Armor if you have it in your possession.

name: Blaidd's Armor
description: Well-worn black armor of the man-wolf BlaiddThe pelt serves as a cape, protecting from cold.Blaidd was the blade of Ranni, but the cold bothered him anyway.
how_to_acquire: Following Ranni's questline, after she is given the Dark Moon Ring, return to Ranni's Rise and you will hear Blaidd talking to himself in front of the tower. When he finishes his dialogue he will turn hostile, and defeating him will grant the player Blaidd's Armor, Blaidd's Gauntlets, and Blaidd's Greaves (as well as the Royal Greatsword).Elden Ring Map here

name: Blaidd's Armor (Altered)
description: Well-worn black armor of the man-wolf Blaidd. Blaidd, who served as Ranni's shadow, was a loyal ally who would defy destiny itself if it would have him turn upon his Lady.
how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Blaidd's Armor if you have it in your possession.

name: Bloodhound Knight Armor (Altered)
description: Metal armor with a jutting breastplate. Worn by the Bloodhound Knights. The Bloodhound Knights are trained as hunters and known to be unshakable trackers. Without the use of language, each knight chooses his own master. Once the decision has been made, the knight stays loyal for life.
how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Bloodhound Knight Armor into Bloodhound Knight Armor (Altered).

name: Bloodsoaked Tabard
description: Padded cloth armor with indelible bloodstains around the neck.Worn by headless foot soldiers who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum.
how_to_acquire: Drops from Mausoleum Foot Soldiers.

name: Blue Festive Garb
description: Ceremonial garb worn by dancers at the festivities in Dominula, the village of windmills. Use of this garb, dyed in a stunning blue, is only permitted for the young maids who play the central role in the festival.
how_to_acquire: The set pieces are dropped by dancers in Dominula, Windmill Village. The regular festive set is dropped by those wearing the yellow hood and garb.

name: Blue Silver Mail Armor (Altered)
description: Chainmail armor crafted with blue silver. Worn by the wolf-riding Albinauric archers. Blue silver is a metal born from the same mother as the archers themselves, and provides protection from magic and frost.
how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Blue Silver Mail Armor, if you have it in your possession.

name: Brave's Battlewear
description: Battlewear fashioned from leather armor adorned with a large sheet of cloth. Garb worn by warriors of the frigid uplands. The red cloth signifies participation in the Long March long, long ago and this ceremonial garb beseeches the favor of the Warrior King who led them.
how_to_acquire: This Chest Armor is currently unobtainable.

name: Brave's Battlewear (Altered)
description: Helm wrapped in thick leather. Garb worn by warriors of the frigid uplands.
how_to_acquire: This Chest Armor is currently unobtainable.

name: Briar Armor (Altered)
description: Battered iron armor from a foreign land. Worn by Elemer of the Briar. The winding, rusted iron briars are a mark of the guilty, and typically indicate a sentence of death. They also cause this armor to deal damage when performing dodge rolls. Elemer murdered numerous instructors and merchants, and was known as the Bell Bearing Hunter.
how_to_acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Briar Armor, if you have it in your possession.

name: Carian Knight Armor (Altered)
description: Armor of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family. The enchanted knights, anointed by the Lunar Queen, were all heroes of the highest honors, but fell into disarray with the decline of the royal family.
how_to_acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Carian Knight Armor into Carian Knight Armor (Altered).

name: Cleanrot Armor (Altered)
description: Armor of the Cleanrot Knights, celebrated for their undefeated campaign in the Shattering. The Cleanrot Knights vowed to fight alongside Malenia, despite the inevitable, if gradual, putrefaction of their flesh. Their acceptance of their fate made these battles the fiercest of all.
